T09TD4153E:197b-1: lo ka a'a nanda n'a ta ka n'a ma /
T09TD4153E:197b-3: 'jig rten kun du dga' ba'i zlos gar zhes bya ba /
T09TD4153E:197b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T09TD4153E:197b-5: bung ba'i phreng ba mi gsal sgra sgrogs rkang pa 'dab ma rnam bskyod pas //
T09TD4153E:197b-6: ge sar kha 'bus ro bcud dang bcas rdul phran tshogs pas khyab gyur cing //
T09TD4153E:197b-7: sbrang rtsi rgya chen thig les rnam khengs me tog thal mo sbyar ba 'dis //
T09TD4153E:197b-8: bdag gis rgyal ba'i zhabs la mchod pas khyed rnams la ni zhi bar mdzod //
T09TD4153E:197b-9: gzhan yang byams pa'i thugs ni rgya chen dga' bas mgul nas yang dag 'khyud gyur pa //
T09TD4153E:197b-10: khyed kyi snying rjes bdag cag kyang ni de bzhin btang snyoms mtshungs mdzad rigs //
T09TD4153E:197b-11: legs pa'i lha mo grags 'dzin mdzad bzhin bdag cag gis ni rjes mi 'gro //
T09TD4153E:197b-12: bdud kyi bu mos phrag dog gis smras khyed rnams sangs rgyas rtogs par shog / rdzogs byang chub la bdud ni khro bas skad cig gzhu bkang de yi sde tshan rnams //
T09TD4153E:197b-13: gang gis rnam par bros pas bub cing log 'dren zhabs kyis mnan te mngon skad 'byin //
T09TD4153E:197b-14: lus med bu mo myos byed ma rnams mchi 'dzag 'chi med rnams kyis mthong nas dga' //
T09TD4153E:197b-15: stobs bcu mnga' ba'i sngon 'gro gzhan gyis mi thub mas ni khyed rnams skyod bar shog / dga' byed kyis mchod pa'i mtha' las mdo 'dzin pa'o //
T09TD4153E:197b-16: snyan ngag tsan dr'a d'a sha y'a //
T09TD4153E:197b-17: zlos gar 'jig rten kun du dga' //
T09TD4153E:197b-18: sngon med zlos gar rab sbyar bas //
T09TD4153E:197b-19: de ring tshogs la bdag gis ston //
T09TD4153E:197b-20: de ni nges par snyan ngag nyid //
T09TD4153E:197b-21: shar phyogs dz'a tu kar na'i rigs las ni //
T09TD4153E:197b-22: lha mo rgyal ma yid kyi shing rta las //
T09TD4153E:197b-23: gang 'khrungs khur ni 'khur bar mi nus kyang//
T09TD4153E:197b-24: de yi bu zhes rab tu grags pa thob //
T09TD4153E:197b-25: gzhan yang rab 'byam rgyan dang bcas shing tshigs bcad rkyang pa mkhas pa'i 'jug dogs rgya chen rnams //
T09TD4153E:197b-26: gang gis dngos po gcig gi brjod byas la yang rgya chen zad par mi 'gyur dang //
T09TD4153E:197b-27: gang gis by'a kar na ni nyung zhing rab gsal yongs rdzogs gzhan yang mdzad gyur nas //
T09TD4153E:197b-28: 'jig rten chags dang 'jig rten mun pa'i tshogs chen rab tu 'joms mdzad gyur //
T09TD4153E:197b-29: de nas da ni rol cha dang bcas te rtsom pa na re zhig rang gi 'phags ma la bos te kye 'phags ma re zhig 'dir byon ces so //
T09TD4153E:197b-30: de nas de ni gdung ba'i shugs dang bcas te rab tu zhugs nas /
T09TD4153E:198a-1: bdag 'ongs sa bka' bsgos shig ces so //
T09TD4153E:198a-2: mdo 'dzin pa nas kye 'phags ma ci'i phyir khyod sdug bsngal bar byed /
T09TD4153E:198a-3: zlos gar ma nas ci'i phyir sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur te /
T09TD4153E:198a-4: ji ltar khyod kyi ming tsam gyis kyang ni //
T09TD4153E:198a-5: gnas rnams yang dag 'dren nus bu gcig po //
T09TD4153E:198a-6: nges par bdag ni rab tu byung nas ni //
T09TD4153E:198a-7: rang lus 'bras bcas bsgrub par bya zhes smra //
T09TD4153E:198a-9: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no //
T09TD4153E:198a-12: de byang chub sems dpa' ma yin nam mkha' las kyang ma lhung zhing //
T09TD4153E:198a-13: rnam par 'dzin byed kyi mthil brtol nas kyang ma byung ngo //
T09TD4153E:198a-15: gang zhig 'dir snying rje skye bo'i phyir 'tsho bar spro ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes brjod do //
T09TD4153E:198a-18: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ni //
T09TD4153E:198a-19: snying rje'i sa bon las skyes pa'i //
T09TD4153E:198a-20: byang chub sems kyi myu gu 'khrungs //
T09TD4153E:198a-21: pha rol phyin pa'i yal 'dab rgyas //
T09TD4153E:198a-22: dpag bsam shing bzhin dgos 'dod rnams //
T09TD4153E:198a-23: sdug bsngal ba des chog go //
T09TD4153E:198a-24: 'di'i bsod nams gyi stobs las de bzhin du dpal du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T09TD4153E:198a-25: yang dag pa'i rol mo rtsom par mdzod cig dang /
T09TD4153E:198a-28: 'dir yang dus gang la brten yang dag pa'i rol mo brtsam par bgyi /
T09TD4153E:198a-30: kye 'phags ma 'dir re zhig gsar du mngon par 'byung ba lhan cig byed pa'i snying ma'i dris yongs su khyab pa me tog gi phreng ba len pa sbrang rtsi byed pa'i rigs kun du dga' zhing rtse ba me tog gi dus la brten la glu long zhig /'di lta ste /
T09TD4153E:198a-31: pad mo rnams ni ba mos rigs nyams 'od ldan gang zhig shar nas dbugs rnams 'byin //
T09TD4153E:198a-32: de bzhin mkhas pa'i lho phyogs rlung rnams kyis ni 'jig rten yang dag tshim par byed //
T09TD4153E:198a-33: phyogs rnam pa l'a sh'a yi ljon shing me tog sha dral bzhin du shin tu dmar //
T09TD4153E:198a-34: bsil zer 'od zer 'gro ba rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bzhin gsal pos yang dag gnas //
T09TD4153E:198a-35: yol ba'i nang nas ngo mtshar che'o ngo mtshar che zhes so //
T09TD4153E:198a-41: rig 'dzin ma yis gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu 'di mthong nas /
T09TD4153E:198b-0: rab dga' g-yo @198b zhing rang gi lag pa'i padma gar rtse zhing //
T09TD4153E:198b-1: nam mkhar rkang gdub rtse la gos kyi 'od zer reg gyur nas //
T09TD4153E:198b-2: gangs ldan ri bo'i rtse mo la ni rab tu rgyu bar byed //
T09TD4153E:198b-3: bdag cag rnams kyang ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par brtsam mo zhes zer nas /
T09TD4153E:198b-4: gnyis po nges par zhugs te /
T09TD4153E:198b-5: mngon du phyogs nas gnas so //
T09TD4153E:198b-6: de nas rig 'dzin ma rab tu zhugs te /
T09TD4153E:198b-7: gar byed cing aa tstshi t'a aam aatstshi r'a aam /
T09TD4153E:198b-8: gang gis skye bo 'di 'dra sa chen steng //
T09TD4153E:198b-9: lha rnams kyis kyang shin tu mthong bar dka' //
T09TD4153E:198b-10: rab tu dga' bas gzhan gyi dbang gyur pa //
T09TD4153E:198b-11: dga' ba'i grogs mo padma ba t'i la //
T09TD4153E:198b-12: bdag gi khur ni yang dag gtad byas nas //
T09TD4153E:198b-13: nam zhig 'ong bar gyur te bdag mi shes //
T09TD4153E:198b-14: zhes nas yongs su zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:198b-15: gang gis 'ongs pa dang 'dug pa'ang mi dran par dga' ba'i grogs mo'i bsti gnas su phyin te bdag nyid ngo mtshar che nas rab tu zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:198b-16: 'dir ji ltar sbrang rtsi byed pa'i rkang pa'i khur gyis me tog rab tu rgyas pa'i rdul gyi tshogs pas khyab pa'i rdo leb gyi steng n'a ga ge sar gyi srang lam du byas pa la dga' ba'i grogs mo padma ba t'i ni sbrang gi bu mo dang lhan cig tu gnas shing cung zad cung zad smra zhing 'khod de /
T09TD4153E:198b-17: drung du nye bar nye bar 'ongs so //
T09TD4153E:198b-18: de nas sbrang gi bu mo dang padma can rab tu zhugs te /
T09TD4153E:198b-20: kye sbrang rtse'i bu mo bdag gi snying myos pa snyam byed do zhes dga' ba'i grogs mo rin chen phreng ba ma la lta bar byed cing /
T09TD4153E:198b-21: ci'i phyir na de tsam du yang mi 'ong bar gyur /
T09TD4153E:198b-22: rig 'dzin mas nye bar thos nas kye padma can sems gtor bar ma byed ces zer /
T09TD4153E:198b-23: 'dir de dag gnyis na re aa re dga'/
T09TD4153E:198b-24: aa re dga' zhes smra zhing gnyis po rtab rtab por langs song nas /
T09TD4153E:198b-25: aa ai ci yin ci yin rig 'dzin ma nas kun gyi lta byed rnams kyis blta bar 'os pa bdag gis mthong ste mig gis 'bras bu thob bo //
T09TD4153E:198b-26: gnyis po nas khyod kyis ci mthong smros shig / rig 'dzin la ni slar yang de nyid smra bar byed do //
T09TD4153E:198b-27: gnyis pos yang 'dri zhing rig 'dzin ma la padma can rab tu 'khyud do //
T09TD4153E:198b-28: bdag ni rab tu dga' ba'i gzhan dbang du gyur te /
T09TD4153E:198b-29: gal te bdag gis dbyangs can ma la bar rnyed na smra'o //
T09TD4153E:198b-31: khyod kyi dga' ba de shin tu lci mo zhig zhugs pa 'dra'o //
T09TD4153E:199a-0: rig 'dzin ma nas 'di ni gzhan mthong nas kyang de la dga' ba chen po @199a * //
T09TD4153E:199a-2: gnyis po nas bdag nyid gcig po 'gegs pas chog gam /
T09TD4153E:199a-3: bdag cag la yang cha shas legs par gos mdzod /
T09TD4153E:199a-5: bdag gis mthong ba dul ba'i mdangs ldan pa //
T09TD4153E:199a-6: 'od zer rab tu 'dren pa 'phro ba can //
T09TD4153E:199a-7: phyogs bzhi chos rnams ma lus sgyu rtsa la tshogs //
T09TD4153E:199a-8: yongs su zhugs rnams mig ni dga' bar byed //
T09TD4153E:199a-10: legs ldan ma zla ba 'am ci zhig / rig 'dzin ma khros te /
T09TD4153E:199a-11: de bzhin du bdag gis ma smras pa rang mchog go //
T09TD4153E:199a-12: kye 'di ni ri dags kyis mtshon te /
T09TD4153E:199a-13: de la mtshungs pa byed dam /
T09TD4153E:199a-16: rig 'dzin ma nas gang de'i sbyor ba dang bral na h'um zhes byed cing byin za'i rtse mo phye ma leb dang 'dra ba ni du ba'i mdangs dang ldan zhing mdzes par rab tu rkyong ngam /
T09TD4153E:199a-18: gang ji ltar yin pa smros dang /
T09TD4153E:199a-19: rig 'dzin ma nas bdag gis smra bar bya yis de legs par nyon cig /'di nas rig 'dzin ma skye bo'i gtam phan tshun smra ba las gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu 'di 'dra'o zhes thos pas ya mtshan che nas dga' ba dang lhan cig s'a ke ta'i grong khyer du bdag gis phyin no //
T09TD4153E:199a-20: de nas rgyal po tshangs byin gyi lha mo 'od kyi blo gros ma la khye'u zhig yang dag par 'khrungs te /
T09TD4153E:199a-21: gzhan gyis bskran [*bskrun] par mi nus shing gzugs dang phun sum tshogs pas rnam par spras pa mchog gi snying rje can gang 'dod pa kun sbyin ba gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu zhes pa bdag gis mthong ngo //
T09TD4153E:199a-22: de yang mthong ban kun gyis mngon par 'dod pa'i don phun sum tshogs pa grub pa'o //
T09TD4153E:199a-23: rgyal po gang zhig gi bu mo'i ched du bu mo de'i sku gzugs dang dbyibs kyi bkod pa thang ka la ri mor bris te khyer ba la bar du rig 'dzin ma rnams kyis brkus te 'khyer bar byed do //
T09TD4153E:199a-24: gnyis po mngon par 'dod pa 'phel te /
T09TD4153E:199a-25: slar yang de gang na yod /
T09TD4153E:199a-29: khyod ni mkha' la 'gro ba 'bras bu dang bcas te 'thob bo //
T09TD4153E:199a-30: gang ji lta ba de bzhin du mngon par 'dod pa yid 'phrog pa rnams khyod kyis gang bar thob bo //
T09TD4153E:199a-32: kye ma rigs dang khyed cag gi yang mngon par 'dod par yongs su 'gyur gyis sbrang rtsi'i bu mo nas /
T09TD4153E:199a-33: gang las bdag cag la 'di'i skal pa sus ster bar byed /
T09TD4153E:199b-3: skyon gang yin smros shig rig 'dzin ma nas //
T09TD4153E:199b-4: gang gis na de khyim thab bya ba las phyir phyogs so //
T09TD4153E:199b-5: m'a dha b'i dang padma ba t'i dag nas 'jig rten yid bzhin gyi nor bu ni shin tu dkon no //
T09TD4153E:199b-7: bdag gis ngo mtshar che ba gzhan yang dran te /
T09TD4153E:199b-8: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gtam gyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu ni ji lta ba bzhin du de la lhan cig skyes pa'i gtsug na nor bu'o //
T09TD4153E:199b-9: m'a dha b'i nas aa tsi ram aam bidya dha ri nas ci'i phyir 'di ngo mtshar che /
T09TD4153E:199b-10: nam mkha'i spyod yul gyis skye bo de mthong ngam /
T09TD4153E:199b-12: bdag cag gis mthong ba'i thabs 'ga' zhig yod dam /
T09TD4153E:199b-13: bidya dha r'i nas ma yin te bdag gis khyer 'ongs so //
T09TD4153E:199b-14: gnyis po ngo tsha zhing rtab rtab bor phyogs rnams su blta zhing /
T09TD4153E:199b-15: de gang na gang na zhes so //
T09TD4153E:199b-16: rig 'dzin mas bdag gi stod gos kyi gseb nas /
T09TD4153E:199b-17: thang ka la ri mo bris pa de phyung nas bstan no //
T09TD4153E:199b-18: gnyis po ngo mtshar nas nges par bltas te /
T09TD4153E:199b-19: gnas tshul ni rin chen phreng ba ma'i phyogs 'dra ba zhig go //
T09TD4153E:199b-22: khyod kyis don med pa'i dga' ba 'phel bar byas te /
T09TD4153E:199b-23: khyod bzhin du legs pa'i nyams dang bcas so //
T09TD4153E:199b-24: grogs mo dga' ma bdag skyon ci mchis smros shig / padma can yun ring du nges par bltas nas /
T09TD4153E:199b-28: padma can sbrang gi bu mos mthong nas sbrang gi bu mo nas /
T09TD4153E:199b-29: smra bar mi nus pa'o zhes zer /
T09TD4153E:199b-31: kye padma ba t'i gdung bar ma byed cig / khyod kyi yang bdag gis thang ka cig ri mor bris te lha mo 'od kyi blo gros ma la byin pa dang /
T09TD4153E:199b-33: de yang mngon par dga' nas 'di tsam zhig bag ma dang mna' ma'i gdong ba mthong nas zhes smra'o //
T09TD4153E:199b-34: 'dis lhan cig tu mna' ma byas nas shin tu spro'o zhes smra'o //
T09TD4153E:199b-36: dga' ba'i grogs mo de bzhin du sbyo bar rigs sam ;
T09TD4153E:199b-37: sbrang gi bu mo dga' nas de nas de nas zhes zer /
T09TD4153E:199b-39: de nas rgyal bo tshangs byin gyis mngon du mthong ngo //
T09TD4153E:199b-42: 'di ni gzhon nu rjes su rjes su 'ongs so //
T09TD4153E:199b-43: 'on kyang byed pa po'i dbang las so //
T09TD4153E:199b-44: de nas gnyis pos ri mo bris pa mngon du bltas nas /
T09TD4153E:200a-1: pa'i mi gzhon nu la ston du bcug go //
T09TD4153E:200a-2: de nas des yun ring du bltas nas /
T09TD4153E:200a-5: de'i mtshan nyid ni gang yin rig 'dzin ma nas /
T09TD4153E:200a-6: lci ba'i skye bo ni rjes su chags so zhes pa'o //
T09TD4153E:200a-7: padma ba t'i ni gang mnyan par bya ba mnyan nas ngus so //
T09TD4153E:200a-8: rig 'dzin ma ni des skrag nas //
T09TD4153E:200a-9: ji ltar bdag gi bdud rtsi'i char byin pas //
T09TD4153E:200a-10: dug gis rnam par khyab par gyur //
T09TD4153E:200a-11: de 'dis slar yang ji ltar bcos par bya //
T09TD4153E:200a-15: de rnams gcig tu 'dir su 'ong ngam snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:200a-16: de nas drang srong dpon slob gnyis rab tu zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:200a-18: bu'i rang bzhin mnyes gshin pa //
T09TD4153E:200a-19: yid gdung gang gis mi shes pa //
T09TD4153E:200a-20: de nyid gcig pu skyes bu ste //
T09TD4153E:200a-21: 'jig rten na ni bde mchog thob //
T09TD4153E:200a-23: bu mo padma can ma ba t'i me tog thur song ba las ci ste yun ring du 'gor ro //
T09TD4153E:200a-24: ci'i phyir khyab 'jug gis ni mtshon byed ma zhes stobs kyis khyer ram /
T09TD4153E:200a-25: tsha zer byed pas zla ba'i cha zhes mi bzod 'od kyis rang nyid rnam zhugs sam /
T09TD4153E:200a-26: yang na rig 'dzin thabs dang phrad nas rig 'dzin yin zhes phyag byas khyer gyur tam /
T09TD4153E:200a-28: sems 'di rang dbang med par yang dag rab tu myos par gyur /
T09TD4153E:200a-30: kye mkhan po de ltar sems gdung mi 'tshal /
T09TD4153E:200a-31: mkhan po'i mthu stobs ni sa gsum na sus kyang 'da' bar mi nus so zhes zer nas gnyis po yongs su zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:200a-32: drang srong gis phyogs rnams su bltas te /
T09TD4153E:200a-34: gal te bung ba'i rigs kyi lus ni rnam khebs zla rnams bral gyur nas //
T09TD4153E:200a-35: gdung bas zhugs shing tshang tshing gis sgrib khron pa rnams su lhung ba'am //
T09TD4153E:200a-36: yang na zla dang 'thabs pas de'i mi bzod brtse zhing rgyug pas lhung //
T09TD4153E:200a-37: yang na byis pa gcig pur du 'am bdag ni shin tu gdung bar byed //
T09TD4153E:200a-38: thams cad kyis mnyam du thos shing mthong nas rtab rtab por gyur nas /
T09TD4153E:200a-39: rig pa 'dzin ma nas yab yin nam ji ltar yin zhes zer ro //
T09TD4153E:200a-40: padma can dang sbrang gi bu mo dag ngo tsha dang bcas bzhin du bdag cag gis ji ltar smras pa yab kyis thos so zhes zer /
T09TD4153E:200a-41: padma ba t'i nas sbrang shing tshang tshing 'di'i nang du zhugs na yab kyis ma mthong ba phyir log pa srid dam snyam nas zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:200b-0: rig 'dzin ma @200b ni rtab rtab por nye bar btud de /
T09TD4153E:200b-5: bu mo rin chen phreng ba ma 'di ci yin zer /
T09TD4153E:200b-6: rig 'dzin ma ni skrag nas bdag ni nges par 'jigs pas na smra mi nus so //
T09TD4153E:200b-7: yab nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin gyis de bzhin du mngon du mdzod cig zer /
T09TD4153E:200b-8: drang srong gis bsam gtan bsgoms so //
T09TD4153E:200b-9: rig 'dzin ma ni shin tu 'jigs par gyur te /
T09TD4153E:200b-10: 'dir yab kyis ci smra'am snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:200b-11: drang srong nas bu mo 'jigs pa des chog go //
T09TD4153E:200b-12: kye 'di la ji lta ba de bzhin bdag dbang che'o zhes zer yang thams cad dga' ba dang bcas par gyur to //
T09TD4153E:200b-13: bdag cag rnams 'dis dbugs phyung snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:200b-15: sngon nas 'di yon tan phun sum tshogs pa rnams ni nye bar thos te //
T09TD4153E:200b-16: mngon par 'dod pa 'di ni mchog yin no //
T09TD4153E:200b-19: bdag cag rnams rjes su bzung ngo //
T09TD4153E:200b-22: the tshom des chog don rnams grub //
T09TD4153E:200b-23: yid kyi shing rta las byung ba'i //
T09TD4153E:200b-24: nges par dka' thub skye bo yi //
T09TD4153E:200b-28: re zhig ri mo las thob pa'ang mchod par 'os par bya'o zhes smra /
T09TD4153E:200b-29: rig 'dzin ma nas me tog blangs nas phul lo //
T09TD4153E:200b-30: drang srong gis de la phul te nges par bltas te /
T09TD4153E:200b-31: ae ma mkhas pa zhig gis bris so //
T09TD4153E:200b-33: yang dag gnas kyis rab dbye 'dug stangs lta tshul dang //
T09TD4153E:200b-34: phra sbom zug dang mtho dma' rtsig pa'i cha rnams dang //
T09TD4153E:200b-35: zhib tshags rnam dag mig ni rab tu g-yo ba 'dra //
T09TD4153E:200b-36: ya mtshan ri mo dag ni nges par smra ba bzhin //
T09TD4153E:200b-37: ae ma bdag gi bu mo ni yid kyi shing rta rab tu dga' bar chags so //
T09TD4153E:200b-39: bdag nyid chen po de nyid ni //
T09TD4153E:200b-40: yul rnams la ni kha phyir phyogs //
T09TD4153E:200b-41: gang gis de phyir gus pa yis //
T09TD4153E:200b-43: bu mo rin chen phreng ba ma yang khyod kyi grogs mo dga' ma dag gang na yod shes sam /
T09TD4153E:200b-45: legs ldan khyod nyid mthong nas tshang tshing gi khang ba 'dir zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:200b-47: padma ba t'i khyod kyis ji ltar ngo tsha yang bslabs sam /
T09TD4153E:200b-48: bu padma can 'dir shog / padma can ni ngo tsha bas 'dar zhing /
T09TD4153E:201a-3: yid ches sems ni the tshom med par lta byed cing //
T09TD4153E:201a-4: lus ni rnam par g-yo med brtan zhing bkur 'dod med //
T09TD4153E:201a-5: byis pa'i blo gros ji bzhin khyod kyis rab dgar 'gyur //
T09TD4153E:201a-6: rang bzhin gyis mdzes brtan ma ci'i phyir 'di ngo tsha //
T09TD4153E:201a-7: padma ba t'i ni phyag 'tshal lo //
T09TD4153E:201a-8: drang srong ni spyi bo la nye bar gtugs te mngon par 'dod pa slar thob par gyur cig ces zer /
T09TD4153E:201a-9: rig 'dzin ma gang gi skye bor gnas pas kye dga' ba'i grogs mo byed pa po yin no //
T09TD4153E:201a-10: gzhan du legs ldan gyis dbyangs ci'i phyir 'jug par 'gyur /
T09TD4153E:201a-11: bdag kyang don 'di la de bzhin du mngon par chags so //
T09TD4153E:201a-12: drang srong slob ma bram ze nas kye mkhan po myur du mdzod /
T09TD4153E:201a-13: rig byed kyi dus tshod la song ngo //
T09TD4153E:201a-15: ji ltar nyi ma gung gi dus la nye bar 'ong ngam /
T09TD4153E:201a-17: da ni rab shing gi gri bam rnams la rig 'dzin rnams bsnyel bso'i mtha'/
T09TD4153E:201a-18: ljon pa'i bsil grib 'og tu ri dags rnams ni skyug ldad byed cing gnas pa dang /
T09TD4153E:201a-19: btsugs shing yur chu rnams nyal zhing gnas pa dang /
T09TD4153E:201a-20: btsugs yu 'gro med rtse mo rnams la lha yi sreg rdzas rnams kyi du ba yang dag 'khrigs //
T09TD4153E:201a-21: dpal ldan chags bral bsod nams mchog gi mngon brjod pa //
T09TD4153E:201a-22: ma lus sa stengs grags pas 'gro ba gcig nyid rgyal //
T09TD4153E:201a-23: gang zhig zlos gar rang dbang nor gyis rab dga'i gar //
T09TD4153E:201a-24: dpal ldan tsandra go mi'i snyan ngag len zhing gnas //
T09TD4153E:201a-25: 'dir thams cad nges par zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:201a-26: yan lag dang po rdzogs so /
T09TD4153E:201a-28: // / de nas snga 'jug ma rab tu zhugs te /
T09TD4153E:201a-29: 'dir ni rgyal rigs lha'i 'jig rten 'dra bar mthong//
T09TD4153E:201a-30: ri mo'i bag ma'ang bag ma'i ltad mo 'di bzhin na //
T09TD4153E:201a-31: gal te 'di ni bden pa yin na ji ltar 'gyur //
T09TD4153E:201a-32: de ci gzhan du 'di ni sngon med mthong bar 'gyur zhes zer nas yongs su blta zhing zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:201a-33: rgyal phran grong mtha'i shin tu mdzes ma rnams //
T09TD4153E:201a-34: 'di rnams 'dir ni de bzhin rnam par spras //
T09TD4153E:201a-35: rgyan gyi 'od zer 'di bzhin 'phro ba yis /
T09TD4153E:201a-36: grong bar rnam khengs gos dmar gar byed bzhin //
T09TD4153E:201a-37: de nas ji ltar dga' ba'i grogs mo lo ma can gyis mthong nas nges par bltas shing 'dir lo ma can dang /
T09TD4153E:201a-38: de bzhin du gar byed cing 'ongs so //
T09TD4153E:201a-39: de nas lo ma can rab tu zhugs te /
T09TD4153E:201a-40: kye kun da khyod nyon cig gsung /
T09TD4153E:201b-0: @201b 'di bzhen du bag ma'i ltad mol btang snyoms su byed pa ci yin /
T09TD4153E:201b-1: kun ta li ka nas kye hanya dze lo ma can lha mos ni bag ma ltad mor byas mod kyi /
T09TD4153E:201b-3: de nas bdag gis yid phyir mi ldog par byed do //
T09TD4153E:201b-5: gang gi skye bo lci ba'i bka' //
T09TD4153E:201b-6: nam zhig gzhon nus 'da' byed dam //
T09TD4153E:201b-7: rin chen 'byung gnas dus rlabs kyis //
T09TD4153E:201b-12: gzhon nu gnyen gyi spyod yul du 'dug pa 'di rnams song ngam /
T09TD4153E:201b-13: kun ta nas ma song ste 'di bzhin 'jug pa gzhon nu la smra ba ni lha mo 'od kyi blo gros ma nas /
T09TD4153E:201b-14: bdag la 'phags pa'i goo ta ma'i nye 'khor ltos la 'phags pa goo ta ma la smros shig / de yang 'di bzhin du grogs pos byas pa la chags pa yin gyis zhes zer ro //
T09TD4153E:201b-16: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i don phun sum tshogs te /
T09TD4153E:201b-17: thams cad kyang rang gi gar rtse bar byed cing gnyis po yang gar byed do //
T09TD4153E:201b-18: lo ma can nges par bltas nas /
T09TD4153E:201b-19: kye de bzhin yin na 'dir 'phags pa goota mas legs ldan ma'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'gro zhing de bzhin 'dir slar 'ong ngam zer nas /
T09TD4153E:201b-20: de nas lha mo 'di dag bdag cag gis smrar deng ngo zhes de dag song ste rab tu zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:201b-21: de nas rtsed grogs bzhad gad pa rab tu zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:201b-22: na mnyam dga' ba thub pa'i skye bo'i rjes su 'jug cing yang dag par spyod pa la lha mo 'od kyi blo gros ma'i skyes 'di'o //
T09TD4153E:201b-23: bdag cag gi snying la zug rdur gnas te /
T09TD4153E:201b-24: de'i ri mor bris pa la yang bag ma'i ltad mo 'di smra zhing /
T09TD4153E:201b-26: 'dir bltas nas slar yang ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar 'dir yang de'i blo rnam par 'byed par bya ste /
T09TD4153E:201b-27: gal te 'jig rten pha rol du //
T09TD4153E:201b-28: bdag cag 'das par gyur na yang //
T09TD4153E:201b-29: rigs rgyud rnam par chad gyur nas //
T09TD4153E:201b-30: mtshun la chu bzhin rnam par 'chad //
T09TD4153E:201b-32: nyams dga' ba'i bya ba 'grub par 'gyur snyam nas nges par bltas pa nas //
T09TD4153E:201b-33: der mnyam dga' ba'i sngar 'jug pa manydzu rab tu dga' ba'i skyed mos tshal nas 'thon byung ngo //
T09TD4153E:201b-34: re zhig 'di la dri'i snyam ste /
T09TD4153E:201b-35: kye manydzu la na mnyam dga' ba gang na yod /
T09TD4153E:202a-2: de 'di na rab tu dga' ba'o //
T09TD4153E:202a-4: der nye bar 'gro bar bya'o zhes rab tu zhugs nas bltas pa na gang zhig sbrang rtsi byed pa'i gshog pa'i rlung gis rab tu bskyod na me tog rnams ni kha bye ze 'bru'i rdul du 'khrigs shing gdong na bung ba rnams ni dzham sgrogs shing 'khor bas 'khrigs so //
T09TD4153E:202a-5: na mnyam dga' ba ma mthong nas /
T09TD4153E:202a-6: manydzu las 'di na bzhugs zer te /
T09TD4153E:202a-7: gal te gdug pa can gyi rig 'dzin mas 'di nas brkus te /
T09TD4153E:202a-8: khyer ba ma yin nam zhes smras pa na /
T09TD4153E:202a-9: rig 'dzin ma rab tu zhugs te /
T09TD4153E:202a-11: ji srid bdag cag gis dga' ba'i grogs mo la /
T09TD4153E:202a-12: gzhon nu'i tshul 'di nye bar smras gyur pa //
T09TD4153E:202a-13: de nas dga' grogs padma ba t'i la //
T09TD4153E:202a-14: mgo la zug rngu yang dag skyes par gyur //
T09TD4153E:202a-15: lus ni nyal ba tsam thob pa ma yin pa shin tu gdung ba 'phel bar gyur te /
T09TD4153E:202a-16: grogs mo'i skye bo yang shin tu gdung bar byed do //
T09TD4153E:202a-17: skabs der dga' ba'i grogs mo spangs te /
T09TD4153E:202a-18: 'ongs kyang ma 'ongs pa ji lta ba bzhin no //
T09TD4153E:202a-19: gzhon nu'i thugs kyang shin tu gdung bar byas so snyam nas /
T09TD4153E:202a-20: lta zhing gzhon nu'i na mnyam mthun pa de bltas nas re zhig bar du 'di gang du 'gro blta bar bya'o snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:202a-21: bzhad gad pas bltas te 'di na re zhig rtsed mo'i ri'i steng na chu'i 'khrul 'khor steng du 'bab cing rab tu g-yo ba dba' rlabs dzha ri'i sgra 'byin pa'i steng na na mnyam mthun pa blta bar bya'o zhes steng du phyin te /
T09TD4153E:202a-22: gar byed cing h'i h'i bho zhes so //
T09TD4153E:202a-23: de nas mya ngan med pa'i tshal gyi rin chen rdo leb yangs pa'i steng na cung zad smra bar byed cing bzhugs nas mchis so //
T09TD4153E:202a-25: rig 'dzin ma ni 'dir re zhig gzhon nu dag yid ches pa'i gtam gang yin mnyam par bya'o snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:202a-26: de nas rab tu zhugs pa na 'dren pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ngo //
T09TD4153E:202a-27: shugs nar phyung ste kye ma 'jig rten rnams ni yul la mngon par zhen par 'gyur te /
T09TD4153E:202a-28: gang des phyin cing 'gro ba gang zhig lan brgyar skyes gyur pa //
T09TD4153E:202a-29: bde ba gang de lan cig ma yin mngon du ma gyur med //
T09TD4153E:202a-30: dpal mo gang der mdzes pa'i rda ma g-yo zhing dgod pa ltar //
T09TD4153E:202a-31: gang zhig ma thob med cing slar yang de la de bzhin chags //
T09TD4153E:202b-0: bzhad gad nye bar mnyen te khyod kyi bde legs 'phel gyur cig /'dren pa ni de bzhin du shlo @202b ka de nyid klog par byed de /
T09TD4153E:202b-1: rig 'dzin ma ni rnga brdung zhing grogs dga' ma la mtshun gyi chu 'byin no zhes so //
T09TD4153E:202b-3: kye bram ze shis par brjod pa'i lan gnang bar mdzod zer /
T09TD4153E:202b-4: 'dren pa ji ltar goo ta ma'am //
T09TD4153E:202b-6: 'dir zhugs shig / bzhad gad pas rang nyid bsams te /
T09TD4153E:202b-7: ji srid du yang na mnyam mthun pa ci zer nyan zhing brtags pan shin tu lci zhing de yang dag par mi dga'o //
T09TD4153E:202b-8: de nas re zhig /'di ltar lha mo'i skyes smra ba'i skabs ma rnyed do //
T09TD4153E:202b-9: de bzhin re zhig smra'o snyam nas gsal bar /
T09TD4153E:202b-10: kye na mnyam dga' ba gzigs gzigs //
T09TD4153E:202b-11: 'di ltar thang shing ljon pa'i dra ba yi //
T09TD4153E:202b-12: bu ga las byung padma'i 'dab mar ni //
T09TD4153E:202b-13: sbrang rtsis myos pa'i bung bas glu len cing //
T09TD4153E:202b-14: padma'i steng na chu rgyun rab tu 'bab //
T09TD4153E:202b-17: bdag cag la rjes su brtse bar mdzad do snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:202b-20: kun kyang bye zhing rgyas ldan pa //
T09TD4153E:202b-21: ge sar nges par ltung ba yis //
T09TD4153E:202b-22: 'gro rnams gnas shing mi rtag pa //
T09TD4153E:202b-23: ji ltar 'di yis gsal bor smras //
T09TD4153E:202b-24: rig 'dzin ma ni ji ltar gsung ba thos nas bdag nyid shin tu gdung bar byed do //
T09TD4153E:202b-25: bzhad gad pas rang nyid bsams te gzhan gang yin smra'o snyam ste /
T09TD4153E:202b-26: rab tu gsal bar kye gzhan yang 'di lta ste /
T09TD4153E:202b-27: sbrang rtsi bsten zhing chu'i 'khor rab g-yo las //
T09TD4153E:202b-28: chu 'dzin lho nas chu rgyun dbus su rnam 'bab pa //
T09TD4153E:202b-29: mthong nas rma bya mdongs rnams rab brkyong gar byed pa //
T09TD4153E:202b-30: na mnyam dga' ba chu rgyun do shal rnams la gzigs //
T09TD4153E:202b-32: na mnyam chu rgyun khang pa 'di nyid gcig pu'am //
T09TD4153E:202b-33: mngon 'dzin dngos po'i rgyu rnams ni //
T09TD4153E:202b-34: skad cig skad cig mngon par 'jig / glu byang rgyun gyi khang pa bzhin //
T09TD4153E:202b-35: 'gro ba thams cad de bzhin 'jug / rig 'dzin ma ni snying brtan par byas la /
T09TD4153E:202b-36: gzhan yang mnyan par bya'o snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:202b-37: bzhad gad pa bdag gi gnas la rnam par bsams te /
T09TD4153E:202b-38: gdung ba sreg pa'i mya ngan grol nus rnams //
T09TD4153E:202b-39: blangs te gang dang gang ni 'dir smras kyang //
T09TD4153E:202b-40: sbyin sreg mar rgyun 'bab bzhin de dang de //
T09TD4153E:202b-41: lhag par shin tu yongs su 'bar bar byed //
T09TD4153E:202b-42: de bas 'dir dgon pa stong par du bar bya'o snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:203a-0: @203a * // de nas mngag gzhug ma rab tu zhugs nas /
T09TD4153E:203a-1: lha mo 'od kyi blo gros mas /
T09TD4153E:203a-2: bdag la bka' bsgos te bag ma'i bkra shis kyi dra ba 'di gzhon nu la khyer te 'ongs so //
T09TD4153E:203a-3: gzhon nu ni de nas yongs su 'chag cing mchis so //
T09TD4153E:203a-4: drung du phyin te nye bar btud nas phyag byas te gzhon nu rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig / lha mo'i bkas bkra shis kyi dra ba 'di blo dang ldan pa khyod kyis nges par byin cig ces so //
T09TD4153E:203a-5: rig 'dzin ma ni mi bzod par gyur /
T09TD4153E:203a-6: aa ae 'dir gang bag mar byas sam snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:203a-7: de bzhad gad pas bzung ste /
T09TD4153E:203a-9: mngag gzhug ma shin tu dga' ste /
T09TD4153E:203a-10: ae ma lha mo mngon par 'dod pa yid kyi shing rta shin tu yang nges so zer nas /
T09TD4153E:203a-11: yongs su zhugs nas song ngo //
T09TD4153E:203a-13: na mnyam skabs med par 'di bzhin bkra shis kyi dra ba bskur ba ci zhig / bzhad gar mnas de sems so //
T09TD4153E:203a-16: bdag gi tshig gang zhig yal bar mi 'dor na smra'o //
T09TD4153E:203a-21: rig 'dzin ma ni sdug bsngal te /
T09TD4153E:203a-22: ae ma dga' ba'i grogs mo'i lus rdzogs pa ni /
T09TD4153E:203a-25: de dag gi sems la bltas nas /
T09TD4153E:203a-26: ci ste bdag yongs su len pa yin nam /
T09TD4153E:203a-30: 'di bzhin byed pa ji ltar bzhad gad pa nas /
T09TD4153E:203a-31: 'di bkra shis dra ba la dris /
T09TD4153E:203a-33: na mnyam yongs su len pa zhes bya ba ni sman med pa'i nad yin /
T09TD4153E:203a-35: gti mug skye mched 'dzin pa zhi ba 'thor zhing phyir log sgrub par byed //
T09TD4153E:203a-36: rnam g-yo'i yid 'ong myos pa'i gnas dang bsam gtan gyis ni gdug pa'i dgra //
T09TD4153E:203a-37: sdug bsngal 'byung gnas bde ba 'joms byed sdig pa'i rang bzhin gnas yin te //
T09TD4153E:203a-38: yongs 'dzin gdong bzhin blo ldan rnams kyang nyon mongs dang ni nyams par byed //
T09TD4153E:203a-39: rig 'dzin mdu [*ma ngu?] zhing gzhan ci zhig lta snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:203a-40: 'dren pa nas gzhan yang na mnyam //
T09TD4153E:203a-41: yongs su 'dzin pa byas gyur kyang //
T09TD4153E:203a-42: bdag ni nags su 'gro bar byed //
T09TD4153E:203a-43: de nas skye bo gzhan rnams kyang //
T09TD4153E:203a-44: yongs su sdug bsngal ci zhig bya //
T09TD4153E:203a-45: rig 'dzin ma ni dga' ba'i grogs mo gzhon nu'i rjes su 'di bzhin 'jug na /
T09TD4153E:203b-2: kye ji ltar 'di bzhin der ni 'jigs bcas 'bab //
T09TD4153E:203b-3: mi dbang gtsug ni 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba yis //
T09TD4153E:203b-4: zhabs la btud dang rgyal po'i phun tshogs yongs spangs nas //
T09TD4153E:203b-5: khyod ni nags na gnas pa ci'i phyir rab tu bsngags //
T09TD4153E:203b-6: 'dren pa nas rab tu bsngags pa'i gnas las gzhan gang zhig kyang mchis sam gzigs mdzod /
T09TD4153E:203b-7: ji ltar der ni dga' 'gyur rab dga'i sa gzhi rnams dang ni //
T09TD4153E:203b-8: mtho ris gang g'a rnams kyi skyed pas byang sa gor ma'i steng //
T09TD4153E:203b-9: gang zhig dga' zhing dga' ba'i ri dags tshogs rnams bsnyen bkur zhing //
T09TD4153E:203b-10: grogs nges nags kyi nang du gnas gyur pa ni skal ba bzang //
T09TD4153E:203b-12: spong ba'i brag ri skye bos dben zhing phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas bzang na //
T09TD4153E:203b-13: phug yangs ri dags rnams kyi spyod yul nags kyi ri mos yongs su bskor //
T09TD4153E:203b-14: so ga'i dus ni bung ba rnams ni rnga sgra snyan par rab sgrogs shing //
T09TD4153E:203b-15: lam zhugs nyon mongs me yang bdag cag rnams la 'byung mi 'gyur zhes sgrogs //
T09TD4153E:203b-16: rig 'dzin ma ni kye ma shin tu lci mo zhig smras so snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:203b-18: kye snying rje med pa ji ltar gnyen 'dun gyi skye bo rnams la mnyes gshin pa'ang khyod la mi 'dug go //
T09TD4153E:203b-20: 'jig rten gyi gnyen la de bzhin du mnyes gshin pa ni /
T09TD4153E:203b-22: 'jig rten thams cad mar me bzhin //
T09TD4153E:203b-23: skad cig skad cig gis skye zhing //
T09TD4153E:203b-25: skye ba med dag mya ngan 'da' //
T09TD4153E:203b-26: gzhan yang na mnyam mnyes gshin pa'i //
T09TD4153E:203b-27: rtsa bar mi shes pa las te //
T09TD4153E:203b-28: mi shes rdul gyis g-yogs gyur pa'i //
T09TD4153E:203b-29: sngon las sa bon ma zad las //
T09TD4153E:203b-30: sred pa'i chu yis dbang bsgyur nas //
T09TD4153E:203b-31: skye ba'i myu gu skye bar 'gyur //
T09TD4153E:203b-33: nye bar dul ba 'di 'dra ba ni /
T09TD4153E:203b-34: thub pa'i skye bo la yang ga la snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:203b-36: gang yang 'dir re zhig 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi rjes su yang 'jug par mdzod cig /'dren pa nas /
T09TD4153E:203b-37: 'jig rten gyi chos gang yin bzhad gad pa nas /
T09TD4153E:203b-38: yul gyi rjes su mngon par dga'o //
T09TD4153E:203b-40: yul gyis chog chog gzigs mdzod /
T09TD4153E:203b-41: yul ni dug bzhin zos tsam nyid na mngar ldan cing //
T09TD4153E:203b-42: rnam par smin pha rab tu tsha ba dug bzhin yul //
T09TD4153E:204a-1: bsrung bar mi nus rab g-yo'i shugs //
T09TD4153E:204a-2: shin tu rmongs byed mun pa stug po dug bzhin yul //
T09TD4153E:204a-3: yang na 'dod pa'i dug dang dug ni gzhal zhig brtags gyur na //
T09TD4153E:204a-4: rang bzhin mi mtshungs yul las dug ni mchog yin te /
T09TD4153E:204a-5: dug gis skye ba gcig nyid dug tu rab 'gro zhing //
T09TD4153E:204a-6: skye ba dpag med du yang yul dug rab tu 'gro //
T09TD4153E:204a-8: kye re zhig bu'i gdong mthong bar mdzod dang /
T09TD4153E:204a-9: de nas nags su lhan cig tu 'gro bar bya'o //
T09TD4153E:204a-12: dper na bya ba 'di ni spang du di ring phyin nas shol byed pa //
T09TD4153E:204a-13: de 'dir skad cig yud tsam 'das gyur skye bo rtog byed de //
T09TD4153E:204a-14: mi bzad gshin rje khros pa dgod cing yongs su rtog pa'i //
T09TD4153E:204a-15: zur gyis blta bas be con mdangs kyang rab tu dmar bar byed /
T09TD4153E:204a-16: rig 'dzin ma ni ngu zhing kye ma grogs mo dga' ma /
T09TD4153E:204a-17: bdag gis 'di bzhin du 'jig rten pha rol du yang khyod kyi sngon du 'gro zhing lam bstan par bya'o zhes rang nyid smra'o //
T09TD4153E:204a-19: kye 'khor gyi skye bo thams cad spang ba ni snying rje ba yang med dam /
T09TD4153E:204a-21: bdag gis rang gi lus kyang yongs su gtong bar byed do //
T09TD4153E:204a-22: bzhad gad pa nas ci'i phyir gtong //
T09TD4153E:204a-26: de khyod bdag gi bya ba btang nas /
T09TD4153E:204a-27: ci ste gzhan gyi bya ba la bdag nyid la sdug bsngal byed //
T09TD4153E:204a-29: dman pa bdag nyid ma shes pa dud 'gro rnams kyang gnas dang zas skom rang byung spyod cing rnyed par sla //
T09TD4153E:204a-30: gang zhig 'dod rnyed shin tu skom tshe chu rnams kyang ni 'thung bar byed //
T09TD4153E:204a-31: gang zhig gzhan phan don du brtson 'grus rtsom byed skyes bu de yi ni //
T09TD4153E:204a-32: rang gi gzi brjid kyis ni bde byed 'di ni skyes bu chen po'o //
T09TD4153E:204a-33: rig 'dzin ma ni snying gi dbugs phyung ngo //
T09TD4153E:204a-35: srog thag ran gyis bcings pa'i mtshan nyid grol lo snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:204a-37: kye ci'i phyir bu khyod gzhan don sgrub par byed /
T09TD4153E:204a-39: gzhan don gyi ri mo mngon par mi shes pa gzigs mdzod //
T09TD4153E:204a-40: gang zhig ngal med rta mgyogs kyis bgrod nyi mas snang bar byed //
T09TD4153E:204a-41: gang zhig khur grangs med par nor ldan rtag tu 'jig rten 'dzin //
T09TD4153E:204a-42: de ni nam yang rang don ma yin de yi rang bzhin nyid //
T09TD4153E:204b-0: chen po gang rnams 'jig rten phan dang bde @204b ba'i ro gcig ro dang ldan //
T09TD4153E:204b-2: kye de bzhin du khyod ni bdag gi ma yin bram ze'i don nam gzhan gyi don lhag pa zhig yod do snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:204b-3: 'dren pa nas snying rje yun ring du ma reg pa yin no //
T09TD4153E:204b-4: bdag mtshon skye bo nang du gdung bas bsreg ldan pa //
T09TD4153E:204b-5: gnyen bshes 'jig rten sdug bsngal gnas pa ci phyir bde //
T09TD4153E:204b-6: 'jig rten kun gyi sdug bsngal bdag gi lus kyis khur //
T09TD4153E:204b-7: dam pa mnar med gnas pa yang ni spro bar byed //
T09TD4153E:204b-8: rig 'dzin ma ni mngon 'dod kyi skabs rnyed do snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:204b-10: kye 'jig rten thams cad de bzhin du khyod kyi gnyen yin nam /
T09TD4153E:204b-13: gang gi mngal du dang po bcings shing gnas //
T09TD4153E:204b-14: gang gi phang du bag ma'i tsha zhing rtses //
T09TD4153E:204b-15: gang zhig rnam bral mtshan rings mya ngan byas //
T09TD4153E:204b-16: 'jig rten 'di rnams sngon nas gnyen pa shes tshogs //
T09TD4153E:204b-18: kye ma 'di'i thugs ni shin tu rgya che'o snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:204b-20: gnyen 'dun 'jig rten rnams kyi don mdzad pa la de las ci'i phyir ring du sdod par byed ces zer ro //
T09TD4153E:204b-21: rig 'dzin ma ni legs par smras so snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:204b-22: 'dren pa ni shugs nar zhes phyung nas don 'dod pa'i skye bo shin tu rnyed par dka'o //
T09TD4153E:204b-24: don bya bar smra ba ni gang /
T09TD4153E:204b-26: lus la sogs pa cung zad slong ba'o //
T09TD4153E:204b-28: don bya ba'i skye bo rnams kyi nang nas lhag par che ba gang yin //
T09TD4153E:204b-30: legs par dris so snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:204b-32: gang zhig sdug bsngal gyis mnar ba'i skyabs gnas so //
T09TD4153E:204b-33: rig 'dzin ma ni shin tu dga' nas 'dir mngon par 'dod pa'i skabs rnyed do snyam nas /
T09TD4153E:204b-34: 'tsher bzhin du nye bar btud de /
T09TD4153E:204b-36: ngu bzhin du bdag ni shin tu mnar bar gyur pas skyabs gnas so //
T09TD4153E:204b-37: mthu chen po bdag ni skal ba dman te rjes su brtse bar mdzod cig 'dren pa ni shin tu mnyes te gzigs nas /
T09TD4153E:204b-38: bzang mo ma 'jigs shig / bdag ni 'jig rten kun gyi gnyen du gnas //
T09TD4153E:204b-39: 'gro rnams don grub mtshan du nye bar bcings //
T09TD4153E:204b-40: ma 'jigs ma 'jigs mi dkar mig can ma //
T09TD4153E:204b-41: di ring ci sgrub bdag la myur du smros //
T09TD4153E:204b-42: bzhad gad pa ni ya mtshan du gyur nas //
T09TD4153E:205a-0: ae ma gzugs bzangs rab tu mdzes pa rgyang pa 'di @205a * //
T09TD4153E:205a-3: don gang bya ba smros shig rig 'dzin ma ni mgo bstod de chags pas bltas nas mthu chen po khyod kyi lus so //
T09TD4153E:205a-4: bzhad gad pa mi bzod cing dga' nas /
T09TD4153E:205a-5: 'di ni ji ltar gdug pa can gyi rig 'dzin ma lta bu'o //
T09TD4153E:205a-6: de re zhig smrar chug snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:205a-8: kye na mnyam phar zur phar zur /
T09TD4153E:205a-9: 'di ni gdug pa can gyi sring mo ste /
T09TD4153E:205a-10: 'dis na mnyam dga' ba lus slong bar byed do snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:205a-13: ji ltar 'dis bdag gzhan du shes te /
T09TD4153E:205a-14: bdag gi grogs mo dga' ma'i don shin tu 'grub pa lha mo 'ga' zhig gis gzhan du bcos so snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:205a-15: 'dren pa mnyes nas lus rab tu slong ba la sring mo de srid nas spobs pa can gyi skye bo slong mo pa bdag gi mthong ngo snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:205a-17: dbyug pa'i shing phyar te phar song phar song sring mo gdug pa can gyi skye bo slong mo pa bdag gis mthong ngo snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:205a-18: na mnyam dga' bas chen po'i dkyil 'khor thams cad las lhag pa'i rgyal srid kyi khur 'khur bar nus pa'i lus slong bar byed dam zhes smra /
T09TD4153E:205a-19: ji ltar slong ba'i skye bo sun 'byin par byed ces bzhad gad pa rgyab tu byas nas shin tu dga' nas bzang mo bdag gi lus slong bar byed pa de de bzhin du bden nam /
T09TD4153E:205a-21: mthu chen po gzhan du nus shing smra ba ma yin no //
T09TD4153E:205a-22: khyod kyi lus mthong ba tsam gyis kyang gang gi gdung ba thams cad nye bar zhi bar mdzad na de yis bdag la gnas par mdzod cig /'dren pa ni mi dga' bar gyur te /
T09TD4153E:205a-23: spobs can gang las gnod byed 'di //
T09TD4153E:205a-24: re zhig bdag gi skal ba min //
T09TD4153E:205a-25: mngon 'dod bdag gis bsgrub bya ba //
T09TD4153E:205a-26: de ltar na yang ci zhig smros //
T09TD4153E:205a-28: bdag gi yid gtsugs grogs mo ni //
T09TD4153E:205a-29: mgo bo zug rdu dang ldan te //
T09TD4153E:205a-30: de'i mthu chen po khyod kyis mthong ba las gtong ste /
T09TD4153E:205a-31: nye bar zhi ba gzhan med do //
T09TD4153E:205a-33: kye 'di ni sgyu ma sprul nas gzhan du smra bar byed de /
T09TD4153E:205a-34: gzhan du de bzhin 'di yis 'chos shing ston par byed do //
T09TD4153E:205a-36: de'i gtam yang mi nyan par khyod kyi yid gcugs grogs mo gang na gnas /
T09TD4153E:205a-38: 'di ni de bzhin du ri bo gangs ldan gyi rtse la gnas so //
T09TD4153E:205b-1: rol ba'i ri bo'i zhol nyid du //
T09TD4153E:205b-2: bos nas bdag cag der re zhig 'gro'o //
T09TD4153E:205b-4: ci ste mthu chen po 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro zhing 'dren pa rnyed par dka' ba ci yang ma mchis so zhes gnyis po gar byed cing nam mkha' la song ngo //
T09TD4153E:205b-6: khyed cag rab tu zhugs te /
T09TD4153E:205b-7: bdag bram ze ni slar yang dri ma lhag ma bsnyil ba bzhin du yongs su spangs so zhes smra /
T09TD4153E:205b-9: na mnyam khyod rang yang longs mdzod /
T09TD4153E:205b-10: bzhad gad pa bdag nyid 'jigs par mthong nas rig 'dzin ma 'dzum zhing bzhad gad pa'i lag pa nas bzung nas yongs su zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:205b-11: 'dren pa ni ya mtshan che nas grogs po ltos ltos //
T09TD4153E:205b-12: nyi ma'i gzugs ni nges lhung rnam par 'jug pa bzhin //
T09TD4153E:205b-13: sa chen ri po dang bcas 'og tu 'gro ba lhar //
T09TD4153E:205b-14: ta ma la yi nags tshal sngon po'i 'gram rnams ni //
T09TD4153E:205b-15: chu 'dzin rab tu bsal gyur ri mos mtha' rnams bskor //
T09TD4153E:205b-17: kye khyod kyi ya mtshan che yang bdag ni bram ze ste /
T09TD4153E:205b-18: 'di nyid du ri gang zhig la brten nas chu snod bzung nas bsod snyoms la brten nas /
T09TD4153E:205b-20: 'dren pa nas ma 'jigs par re zhig ya mtshan che ba ltos shig dang /
T09TD4153E:205b-21: ri bo khang bzang 'dra zhing chu 'dzin g-yo ba'i bla re la brten pa //
T09TD4153E:205b-22: chu klung ngur pa'i sgrog gis 'gram bcings lam chen rdul rnams 'thul pa ltar //
T09TD4153E:205b-23: chu gter yongs su bskor ba'i 'obs chen bzhin du rab mtho'i 'gram ldan pa //
T09TD4153E:205b-24: sa chen dkyil 'khor gnas gcig bzhin du yang dag gsal bor kun nas ma tshon //
T09TD4153E:205b-25: rig 'dzin ma nas aa ho gzhon nus nye bar gzigs so //
T09TD4153E:205b-27: gting zab mo 'jigs pa'i 'og gi sa chen po'i mthil mthong nas /
T09TD4153E:205b-28: bdag nyid nges par 'jigs par snang nas gzugs gzhan la steng du bltas pa dang /
T09TD4153E:205b-30: kye gangs ri'i rtse mo tshogs pa bzhin du nam mkha'i mthil khengs nas 'jug pa 'di ci zhig yin /
T09TD4153E:205b-31: rig 'dzin ma rnam par gnod cing /
T09TD4153E:205b-32: aa ho bram ze 'di ni mtshan nyid yin no //
T09TD4153E:205b-33: 'dren pas gzigs nas 'di ni nges par skar ma rnams so //
T09TD4153E:205b-35: skar ma la 'di 'dra ba'i tshad gang la yin //
T09TD4153E:206a-1: ni 'di bzhin du rgya chen po'i tshad dang ldan no //
T09TD4153E:206a-3: sa'i mthil nas chu ngur mtshon pa ji ltar yin /
T09TD4153E:206a-5: de yang ring po nas shin tu phra zhing /
T09TD4153E:206a-8: yang mi ltung bar 'jug pa ji ltar yin /
T09TD4153E:206a-10: bdag cag shin tu mthon por gnas kyang mi ltung ba bzhin no //
T09TD4153E:206a-12: yang 'di nyin par mi mthong ba ji ltar yin /
T09TD4153E:206a-14: nye bar btud na nyin par kyang 'di bzhin mthong ngo //
T09TD4153E:206a-16: gzhon nus 'di rnams thams cad sngon gzigs pa snyam byed do //
T09TD4153E:206a-18: kye na mnyam dga' ba chu gter gyi rlabs rnams las rlung drag pas rab tu bskyod pa bzhin du ka la'i sgra sgrogs pa'ang 'di ji ltar lags /
T09TD4153E:206a-20: brtags nas 'di ni nam mkha' chu klung gang g'a'i sgra ste /
T09TD4153E:206a-22: lhag ma nyal ba bzhin du chu klung rnam spangs lha lam mthong ba'i phung po las //
T09TD4153E:206a-23: phyogs kyi glang chen rnams ni rtse zhing sna yis chu 'thor thigs pa zer ma rnams //
T09TD4153E:206a-24: yang dag tshim pa skye 'gyur chu thigs mu tig 'bras bu'i 'od zer mdzes pa ltar //
T09TD4153E:206a-25: drang srong bdun po rnams ni gser gyi padma 'dzin cing khrus la rab tu 'jug / drang srong bdun po 'di rnams ni phyag bya ba'i 'os so zhes thams cad kyis phyag byas so //
T09TD4153E:206a-27: 'jig rten kun gyi phan mdzad phyir //
T09TD4153E:206a-28: gzhan yang gtsug gi rin chen ltar //
T09TD4153E:206a-29: bud med rin chen rin chen bu //
T09TD4153E:206a-30: mtshungs pa yang dag thob gyur cig / rig 'dzin ma shin tu dga' ste /
T09TD4153E:206a-31: 'di rnams ma rmongs pa'i tshig gis ji lta ba bzhin du mchog sbyin no snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:206a-33: kye na mnyam 'di yis mkha' la 'gro ba'i stebs [?] kyis bdag cag yongs su phyin te //
T09TD4153E:206a-34: de nas 'dir nam mkha'i gang g'a la yud tsam cig ngal bso cig zer ro //
T09TD4153E:206a-35: snyan ngag tshogs rnams glu yis snyan par rab sgrogs bskyed pa'i gnas //
T09TD4153E:206a-36: chags bral kun gyis sgrogs shing brjod pa de ni rgyal bar byed //
T09TD4153E:206a-37: gad gis rang nyid rnam phyung rnam gshegs gzings kyi yal ga yi //
T09TD4153E:206a-38: lugs las nye bar blangs nas tsandra go mis rab tu sbyar //
T09TD4153E:206a-39: zhes pas rab tu zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:206a-40: thams cad kyi yan lag gnyis pa rdzogs so /
T09TD4153E:206b-0: // / @206b de nas sprang gi bu mo rab tu zhugs te /
T09TD4153E:206b-1: du [*ngu] zhing rin chen phreng ba ma //
T09TD4153E:206b-2: 'di nas song nas nyi ma 'di tsam gyi bar du ji ltar bdag gis padma ba t'i dbugs phyung ngo //
T09TD4153E:206b-3: di ring na ni lhag par yang mgo bo'i gzugs yang dag skyes so //
T09TD4153E:206b-4: rin chen phreng ba ma ni gang dang gang yun ring po de dang de nas bzod par dka' zhing rgyal ba'i bde bas mig mdongs shing mchi ma 'bab cing 'jug pa ni chu thogs so bzhin du grogs mo'i snying ni shin tu gdung bar byed do //
T09TD4153E:206b-5: bdag gi don grub pa de rnams dgos pa yang mi shes te /
T09TD4153E:206b-6: rin chen phreng ba ma 'ongs na yang 'bras bu med do snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:206b-7: bdag gis rab tu gdung ba'i phyir spang ba'i thabs su gyur pa mthong nas /
T09TD4153E:206b-8: de nas grogs mo dga' ma'i drung du 'gro'o snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:206b-9: yongs su zhugs nas bltas pa na de'i grogs mo dga' ma padma ba ti'i ni yongs su sa brtol rkang 'thung gi 'og zla ba nor bu rdo ba'i steng na thig le blo gros ma'i lus kyi steng du nye bar brten nas gnas so //
T09TD4153E:206b-10: 'di ni stong pa'i mthar gcig pu gnas so zhes nye bar zhugs te /
T09TD4153E:206b-11: de nas padma ba t'i dang /
T09TD4153E:206b-12: thig le'i blo gros ma'ang ji ltar lta zhing rab tu zhugs pa na rang nyid bsams te shugs nar zhes phyung ngo //
T09TD4153E:206b-13: legs ldan me tog mtshon can gyis kyang rang lus sreg pa'i tshor ba ji ltar shes par ma gyur te //
T09TD4153E:206b-14: shes na gzhan rnams ji ltar sreg par byed //
T09TD4153E:206b-15: sbrang gi bu mo nye ba rab tud de /
T09TD4153E:206b-16: grogs mo dga' ma di ring mnyel bar ma gyur tam /
T09TD4153E:206b-17: padma ba t'i ni slar yang de bzhin du smra bar byed do //
T09TD4153E:206b-18: thig le blo gros ma nas /
T09TD4153E:206b-19: kye padma ba t'i ci'i phyir gus par mi byed /
T09TD4153E:206b-20: 'di ni khyod kyi dga' ba'i grogs mo'o //
T09TD4153E:206b-21: padma pa t'i rtab rtab por gdan gang na bdag gi grogs mo dga' ma rin chen phreng ba ma /
T09TD4153E:206b-22: thig le bro gros ma nas ma yin te /
T09TD4153E:206b-24: padma ba t'i bdag ngo tsha nas bdag ni yang dag pa'i yul chos las shin tu 'das so snyam nas /
T09TD4153E:206b-26: grogs mo sprang gi bu mo bdag ni shin tu gdung bas gzir bas shin tu 'khrug par gyur to //
T09TD4153E:206b-28: grogs mo dga' ma dbugs phyung shig skyes bu dam pa'i gtam bsil ba bzhin du padma'i 'dab ma 'di rnams khyod la brlan no //
T09TD4153E:206b-29: padma ba t'i nas 'di sol cig / nor bu chu shel gyi rdo ba'i steng na yang sreg bsnyam byed do //
T09TD4153E:207a-0: @207a * // padma'i 'dab ma khyer la shog / gnyis po nas /
T09TD4153E:207a-1: 'dir ji ltar tsan ngan gyi khu bas gtor zhing /
T09TD4153E:207a-2: grogs mo dga' ma khyod kyi nu ma dag gi bar na byin nas bzhag kyang de yang lhag par shin tu gdung bas gzir nas yongs su skom par byed do //
T09TD4153E:207a-3: padma ba t'i ni sdug bsngal nas ha la 'di rnams sol la bdag nor bu chu shel gyi rdo ba'i steng du khyer cig ces smra /
T09TD4153E:207a-4: gnyis po rang la bsams te ngu zhing /
T09TD4153E:207a-5: kye ma 'di'i sems gzhan du gyur to snyam nas gsal por smras pa /
T09TD4153E:207a-6: grogs mo 'di ni ji ltar nor bu chu shel gyi rdo ba'i steng na thigs pa'i rgyun mi 'chad par rnam par 'bab pa'i zer ma 'thor zhing chags so //
T09TD4153E:207a-7: padma ba t'i nas 'di ni chog go //
T09TD4153E:207a-8: bdag gi ni rin chen phreng ba mas 'ongs pa'i bris sku lta'o zhes smra'o //
T09TD4153E:207a-9: gnyis po phan tshun bltas te shin tu mi dga' bar gyur te /
T09TD4153E:207a-10: ji ltar 'di la zug rngu yang med dam zhes gsal bar smras pa /
T09TD4153E:207a-11: grogs mo 'di ni ji lta ba de ni 'di'o /
T09TD4153E:207a-13: yang rim bris pa'i gzugs brnyan de gang na zhes smra /
T09TD4153E:207a-14: gnyis po nas 'di na med pa ma yin te /
T09TD4153E:207a-15: khyed kyi mdun na mchis so //
T09TD4153E:207a-16: padma can gyis yun ring ji ltar 'di ltar zug rngu yang med dam zhes gsal bar smras pa /
T09TD4153E:207a-17: grogs mo 'di ni ji lta ba de ni 'di'o //
T09TD4153E:207a-18: padma ba t'i gnam du bltas nas ngu zhing bdag nyid bsams pa /
T09TD4153E:207a-19: gang zhig bris sku'i gzugs brnyan 'di 'dra bde ni kye ma brtse ba med pa'i tshig tsam la 'ga' zhig gis yang skye bo 'di rjes su brtse ba can no zhes bsgrags so snyam nas nam mkhar bltas te /
T09TD4153E:207a-20: legs ldan mda' lnga khyed kyis 'dir //
T09TD4153E:207a-22: 'di ni yon tan rjes chags pas //
T09TD4153E:207a-23: yang na 'dis bsreg mthu med dam //
T09TD4153E:207a-24: stobs med rnams dang 'drar skyes na //
T09TD4153E:207a-25: dpa' mthong mngon pa'i nga rgyal lo //
T09TD4153E:207a-26: phyogs rnams su blta bar byas nas /
T09TD4153E:207a-27: gzhan ci zhig lta bar byed 'dir yang 'phags pa'i bu'i bris sku la 'khyud nas /
T09TD4153E:207a-28: bdag nyid nyams par byed do zhes smra /
T09TD4153E:207a-29: sprang gi bu mo langs nas /
T09TD4153E:207a-30: phyogs rnams la bltas pas ji ltar 'dis dri ma med pa'i nam mkha'i mthil du bya rnam par rgyu ba yang ma mtshon no //
T09TD4153E:207b-0: 'dir glog gi ri mo rab tu 'gyed pa bzhin du dri ma med pa'i nam mkha'i khams na @207b rnam par 'phro ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T09TD4153E:207b-1: ha la khyed gnyis kyis ci zhig ltos shig //
T09TD4153E:207b-2: bdag ni gdung bas non to //
T09TD4153E:207b-4: ri'i rtse mos mngon par g-yogs pa bzhin no //
T09TD4153E:207b-5: de nas shig le blo gros mas nges par bltas nas /
T09TD4153E:207b-6: re zhig 'di ci zhig ces thig le blo gros ma grogs mo dga' ma la smras par bya'o snyam nas nges par zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:207b-7: yang gzhon nu dang bcas te rin chen phreng ba ma de bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T09TD4153E:207b-8: de nas rin chen phreng ba ma dang gzhon nu dang /
T09TD4153E:207b-9: bzhad gad pa rnams kyang rab tu zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:207b-12: drang srong gi gnas kyi mtshan nyid 'dir yang dag par 'thul ba du ba'i rang bzhin sbyin sreg gi du ba'i phreng bas bar snang khebs shing phan tshun dgra yongs su 'jug pa'i dud 'gro'i tshogs rnams kyang gnyen gyi 'jug pa khyad par can shin tu mnyes gshin pa phun sum tshogs pa drang srong gi gnas so //
T09TD4153E:207b-14: grogs po 'dir ngo mtshar che ba 'di lta ste /
T09TD4153E:207b-15: stag mo yang ni khong nas dul zhing mig ni rab btsugs ri dags phru gu rnams ni ldag par byed //
T09TD4153E:207b-16: mnyes gshin rab dga' gtsug phud can ni mdongs rnams rab brkyang lteng ka rnams ni 'tshe ba bskyab phyir skyong //
T09TD4153E:207b-17: seng ge yang ni glang mo gang zhig song ba'i phru gu rnams ni rang gi bu bzhin srung bar byed //
T09TD4153E:207b-18: gang rnams kyi ni byams pa'i gnas bcas nags dang ri bo'i phug na rnam par gnas pa de rnams rgyal //
T09TD4153E:207b-19: rig 'dzin ma nges par bltas nas /
T09TD4153E:207b-20: bdag gi grogs mo dga' ma'i nye 'khor du phyin no //
T09TD4153E:207b-21: 'dir ni grogs mo dga' ma tsan dan rnon po shin tu chags pa zla ba bzhin du zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar rnam par mdzes so snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:207b-22: bzhad gad pa ngo mtshar che nas /
T09TD4153E:207b-23: bho na mnyam gzigs gzigs bud med 'di ni rin po che ltar 'di'i 'jam mdangs 'od zer rab tu 'bab pa skye zhing bskyang bas mnyel nas gzigs pa lta bu'o //
T09TD4153E:207b-25: na mnyam pa rnams kyi khyad par can rnams ring du gyur pas khyod kyis mngon par ma shes te khyod rin po che dang snyam mam /
T09TD4153E:207b-27: rin chen gzhan rnams mngon par 'dod //
T09TD4153E:207b-28: de ni rin chen lta mi byed //
T09TD4153E:208a-2: bzhad gad pa nas yid kyi shing rta'i me tog ni mthong ngo zhes so //
T09TD4153E:208a-3: padma can dang sbrang gi bu mo zur gyis lta zhing rin chen phreng ba ma ni shin tu ring du thogs so zhes smra /
T09TD4153E:208a-5: kye na mnyam snyan par smra ba ni 'di lta bu'o //
T09TD4153E:208a-7: na mnyam pa 'di ci zhig brjod ce na /
T09TD4153E:208a-8: kye gang zhig zur gyes bltas pas rnam par 'phangs gyur pa //
T09TD4153E:208a-9: yid 'ong spyan las snyan par smra pa phyogs pa ni //
T09TD4153E:208a-10: g-yo med de 'dir sa chen steng gnas myos pa'i le lo yis //
T09TD4153E:208a-11: lus la me tog la gnas pa de ltar na 'di sbrang rtsi'i //
T09TD4153E:208a-12: rig 'dzin ma ni byed pa po rjes 'jug par mthong ngo //
T09TD4153E:208a-14: shin tu dga' nas rang nyid bsams te /
T09TD4153E:208a-15: 'di ni mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ste /
T09TD4153E:208a-16: 'di ni ji ltar thang kha la ri mo bris pa bdag gis mthong ba de'i snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:208a-18: mthu chen po re zhig ji srid de la smra ba'i bar du mnyel so bar mdzod cig /
T09TD4153E:208a-20: khyod ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bya'o //
T09TD4153E:208a-21: rig 'dzin ma shin tu dga' nas nye bar song ngo //
T09TD4153E:208a-23: grogs mo dga' ma ltos ltos /
T09TD4153E:208a-24: 'di ni rin chen phreng ba ma'o //
T09TD4153E:208a-26: de gang na gang na zhes zer te /
T09TD4153E:208a-27: sbrang rtsi'i bu mo dang padma can dag gis gcig pu nyid du mthong nas brgyal nas gar byed do //
T09TD4153E:208a-28: rig 'dzin ma shin tu dngangs nas /
T09TD4153E:208a-29: dga' ma khyod kyi yid kyi shing rta grub bo //
T09TD4153E:208a-31: grogs mo dga' ma dbugs phyung shig / rig 'dzin ma nges par bltas te /
T09TD4153E:208a-32: kye ma bdag skal ba dman pad shi zin /
T09TD4153E:208a-33: ha dhi ha dhi 'dir su 'jug par byed ces yongs su 'khyud nas bltas so //
T09TD4153E:208a-34: kye ma skal ba dman pa yid kyi shing rta lag tu 'ongs nas yang slar 'dor bar byed dam zhes smra zhing rig 'dzin ma nas /
T09TD4153E:208a-35: gzhon nu yongs su skyob par mdzod cig /'dir ni bdag gi grogs mo dga' ma mthar byed kyis gsod cing 'phrog par byed do //
T09TD4153E:208a-36: 'dren pa ni rtab rtab por kye ma rab tu myos so //
T09TD4153E:208a-38: na mnyam dga' ba myur du mdzod cig / gnyis po yang nye bar drung du phyin to //
T09TD4153E:208a-39: rig 'dzin ma gzhon nu'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te /
T09TD4153E:208a-40: mthu chen po grogs mo dga' ma rjes su brtse bar mdzad du gsol //
T09TD4153E:208b-0: 'dren pa ni ngo tsha zhing 'jigs pa dang bcas nas bdag bsgrub par bya @208b gang ;
T09TD4153E:208b-1: khyod kyis nye bar bsgo bar mdzod //
T09TD4153E:208b-3: rig pa kun gyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur pa la /
T09TD4153E:208b-4: bdag gis ci zhig nye bar ston /
T09TD4153E:208b-5: de ltar na'ang re zhig mthu chan po'i phyag las bdud rtsi'i rgyun bsil ba rab tu 'bab pa las grogs mo dga' ma yongs su reg par mdzod cig /'dren pa nas padma can gyi mgo la legs par reg nas /
T09TD4153E:208b-7: 'dir ni rnam pa nyams pa bzhin //
T09TD4153E:208b-8: dga' ba thob las rnam nyams sam //
T09TD4153E:208b-9: khyod kyi rnam nyams sdug bsngal 'phel //
T09TD4153E:208b-10: padma can ni mig cung zad phye nas /
T09TD4153E:208b-12: ma la ya skyes khu ba sor mos bzhin la byugs //
T09TD4153E:208b-13: ri dags mig can 'di ni dkyus ring mig phye ba //
T09TD4153E:208b-14: chu 'dzin rab tu dkar bas cha rnams phyed g-yogs pa //
T09TD4153E:208b-15: mkha' la chu 'dzin dal gyis 'gro ba zla ba'i dbyibs //
T09TD4153E:208b-16: rig 'dzin ma ni grogs mo dga' ma 'tsho bar mthong ste /
T09TD4153E:208b-21: grogs mo dga' ma yid kyi shing rta mthong ngo //
T09TD4153E:208b-23: mthu chen pos 'di re zhig mgo bo'i zug nye bar zhi'o //
T09TD4153E:208b-24: 'di'i lus kyang phyag gi mthil gyis reg par mdzod cig /'dren pas lus rnams kyang byugs nas /
T09TD4153E:208b-26: mi dga' ba da chog go //
T09TD4153E:208b-27: d'i ni khur gyis dub pa 'jam pa'i lus ni rab g-yo bzhin //
T09TD4153E:208b-28: yid 'ong dri yis 'gro zhing bung ba'i gshog pas rnam bskyed pa //
T09TD4153E:208b-29: mtshan mo mal ti yi me tog phreng ba byed pa bzhin //
T09TD4153E:208b-30: 'di yi lus rnams rim gyis gsal por yang dag g-yo bar byed //
T09TD4153E:208b-32: grogs mo dga' ma dbugs shig dbugs shig / mthu chen pos khyod 'dir rjes su bzung ngo //
T09TD4153E:208b-33: de yis gzigs nas 'dir yid kyi shing rta rang gi lus bzhin du brjod //
T09TD4153E:208b-34: padma can ni 'jigs shing nges par bltas te /
T09TD4153E:208b-35: ngo tsha bas 'dar zhing langs nas 'bros 'dod pas ma nus te rings nas gar byed do //
T09TD4153E:208b-36: rig 'dzin ma nas grogs mo dga' ma de tsam ma rings shig re zhig gsar du 'ongs pa la stan gcig la gnas nas bsnyen bkur bar gyis shig /'dren pa nas /
T09TD4153E:208b-37: dkar min mig can 'jigs bcas khyod ni sdug bsngal ba //
T09TD4153E:208b-38: chog chog lus ni gdung bas cung zad g-yo ba can //
T09TD4153E:208b-39: me tog phreng ba cung zhig kha 'bus 'dab ma rnams //
T09TD4153E:209a-0: bung ba rnams kyi rkang pa yang @209a * //
T09TD4153E:209a-2: padma can rang nyid bsams te /
T09TD4153E:209a-3: ci ste 'di ni 'dir nags nas 'ongs sam /
T09TD4153E:209a-4: yang na 'di bzhin du snang ba'am /
T09TD4153E:209a-5: yang na rmi lam du snang ba 'am snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:209a-7: grogs mo dga' ma 'di ni de yin te /
T09TD4153E:209a-8: khyod kyis gzhon nu'i sku gzugs thang sku ni ri mor bris pa la mchod pa'i phyir ba ku la'i me tog phreng ba gang zhig nyid kyis brgyus pa'o zhes bstod do //
T09TD4153E:209a-9: padma can ni 'dren pa la zung gyis blta zhing ri mo'i sku gzugs la de phul lo //
T09TD4153E:209a-10: 'dren pas ri mo bltas nas 'di ni kho bo bzhin du ri mor bris ba zhig go //
T09TD4153E:209a-11: ha aa ho bdag la gus ba cher mchis so //
T09TD4153E:209a-13: khyod kyi lha rnams gus pas bsnyen bkur bsad ltar de khyod la 'di bzhin du'o //
T09TD4153E:209a-17: lha rnams kyang gus pas bsnyen bkur nas mchog gsol bar byed do //
T09TD4153E:209a-18: khyod ni dka' thub ma'i mngon par 'dod pa'i gang yang sbyin mi byed do /
T09TD4153E:209a-19: grogs mo dga' nas legs par smras so //
T09TD4153E:209a-20: 'dren pa ni 'dzum zhing khyod kyis de bzhin du mchog ster shes sam /
T09TD4153E:209a-22: gal te khyod bdag gi rjes su 'jug na bram ze yin pas sbyin par bya'o //
T09TD4153E:209a-24: bdag gi rjes su 'jug par bya /
T09TD4153E:209a-25: bzhad gad pas khyod de bzhin du 'di'i mchog tu bdag gis sbyin /
T09TD4153E:209a-26: 'dren pa nas khyod ni tha shal rmongs pa rab tu mi shes pa'o //
T09TD4153E:209a-28: khyod ni shin tu mi bzod do //
T09TD4153E:209a-30: na mnyam rab tu gsal ba'i dgongs pa la yang 'dis shin tu sbyin par byed de gzigs mdzod //
T09TD4153E:209a-31: bdag ni rab tu brkyang la tshul 'chos lus ni ngo tshas sdud byed cing //
T09TD4153E:209a-32: yid 'ong mig ni gsal por 'phangs shing skad cig nyid la slong bar byed //
T09TD4153E:209a-33: bdag ni mi bzod lta bas blta zhing slar yang mngon 'dod 'dren par byed //
T09TD4153E:209a-34: byis pa'i blo yi dgongs pa rab tu spro zhing g-yo yang 'dir mi byed //
T09TD4153E:209a-37: ca co chen po zhig grags so //
T09TD4153E:209a-38: thams cad 'jigs nas nye bar langs so //
T09TD4153E:209a-39: bzhad gad pas nye bar bltas nas 'di ni gang nas glang chen myos pa yang dag rgyug byed cing //
T09TD4153E:209a-40: 'dir ni ji ltar shugs kyis mi bzad sna yi 'khyil byas nas //
T09TD4153E:209b-0: chu rnams 'phen pa char 'bab bzhin du stobs kyis rab tu 'jug / gdong la myos 'bab dri la sbrang rtsi byed @209b rnams rjes su 'jug / yol ba la ca co smra'o //
T09TD4153E:209b-1: bzhad gad pa ni shin tu 'jigs te kye na mnyam yongs su skyob par mdzod ces smra'o //
T09TD4153E:209b-2: padma can ni shin tu 'jigs te /
T09TD4153E:209b-3: gzhon nu la kun nas 'khyud do //
T09TD4153E:209b-5: mthu chen po grogs mo dga' ma bsrung bar mdzod cig zer /
T09TD4153E:209b-6: 'dren pa nas ma 'jigs shig /'jigs ldan ma dul glang chen myos //
T09TD4153E:209b-7: so ldan gnam lcags mche ba can //
T09TD4153E:209b-8: bdag gi brang gis de mtshungs par //
T09TD4153E:209b-9: rtag tu rab gsal 'di bzung ngo //
T09TD4153E:209b-11: de ni 'jigs pa 'di ga la byung /
T09TD4153E:209b-13: 'jigs pa rnams kyi mi 'jigs rab spyin sa gsum rab tu tshim byed khyod ni gnyen //
T09TD4153E:209b-14: sdug bsngal chu gter klong 'khrugs 'gro rnams yang dag sgrol ba'i gzings nyid do //
T09TD4153E:209b-15: khyod kyi phyag ni rab tu gsal ba'i rgyan gyis rol zhing kun 'khril so ldan po //
T09TD4153E:209b-16: gtum zhing g-yo bas 'jig rten ma lus 'dir ni skrag pa'i gnas skabs ga la 'gyur //
T09TD4153E:209b-18: kye dga' ma bdag thong zhig / glang po gtum po ni song /
T09TD4153E:209b-19: rig 'dzin ma dgod cing di ring yang khyod gang du yang mi gtong ngam /
T09TD4153E:209b-20: gzhon nu rang bzhin bsams te /
T09TD4153E:209b-21: gal te bdag 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs su 'ga' zhig mthong bar mi 'gyur ram /
T09TD4153E:209b-22: bdag ni tshul dang 'dra ba ma yin no snyam nas ;
T09TD4153E:209b-23: de nas drang srong gi slob ma rab tu zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:209b-24: rtab rtab por kye ma ji ltar ri dags kyi rigs rnams kyang 'di dang der shin tu skrag pas rab tu 'jug cing sems ni dang ngas par gyur /
T09TD4153E:209b-25: glang chen rab tu 'jigs pas thub pa'i gzhon nu rnams kyang gsal por du bar gyur /
T09TD4153E:209b-26: padma ba t'i ni gang du song ngam snyam nas yongs su zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:209b-27: mthong nas shin tu mi bzod pas /
T09TD4153E:209b-29: aa tshangs pa kye ji ltar dka' thub kyi tshal na 'gal bar 'jug go zhes smra /
T09TD4153E:209b-32: ji ltar 'phags pa'i spyod pa'i bu'o //
T09TD4153E:209b-33: padma can ni gzhon nu btang ste /
T09TD4153E:209b-34: ngo tsha nas kha 'og tu phyogs nas gnas so //
T09TD4153E:209b-36: 'di lag ldan gyi 'jigs pas bdag gis padma ba t'i nas 'byung zhes drang srong dus so //
T09TD4153E:210a-0: slob ma ni ngu zhing mkhan po yongs su skyob par mdzod cig / yongs su skyob par mdzod cig / padma ba t'i ni 'di na yongs su sun 'byin par byed cing mchis @210a * //
T09TD4153E:210a-2: grogs mo dag shin tu 'jigs shing shin tu mi phan par gyur to snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:210a-3: gzhon nu ni mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid sdug bsngal bar bdag lhung ngo snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:210a-4: bzhad gad pa ni mi bzod par aa re ae re bram ze gdug pa can mi bden pa smra zhing ci'i phyir khyod du zhes dbyug pa'i shing gyen du phyar te nye bar btud do //
T09TD4153E:210a-5: bram ze ni aa tshangs pa kye mkhan po yongs su skyob par mdzod ces smra /
T09TD4153E:210a-6: de nas thub pa ni khros /
T09TD4153E:210a-7: rab tu zhugs nas a'a 'di su zhig nges par bltas nas /
T09TD4153E:210a-8: lag pa dang rkang par bcas par rdobs shing /
T09TD4153E:210a-9: lha rnams thams cad stongs sam ci //
T09TD4153E:210a-10: dmod pa rnams ni yal gyur tam gang zhig thub pa'i rigs rnams kyang //
T09TD4153E:210a-11: kun nas gnod cing yongs su 'jig / ces smra /
T09TD4153E:210a-12: kye bu padma ba t'i ae ma gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu la padma bdag gi yid kyi sbyin par byas te gdung bar byed do //
T09TD4153E:210a-14: legs pa'i drang srong chen po gang //
T09TD4153E:210a-15: bdag phyir de bzhin rjes gdung ba //
T09TD4153E:210a-16: kun spyod khrims las 'das gyur na //
T09TD4153E:210a-17: skyes bu padma can bzhin gdung //
T09TD4153E:210a-18: bdag las kun spyod rnams 'gal nas //
T09TD4153E:210a-20: bzhad gad pa shin tu 'jigs nas gnas skabs 'dir ci zhig smra /
T09TD4153E:210a-23: thub pa'i skye bo'i lha rnams ni gang dang gang /
T09TD4153E:210a-25: bram ze g-yo can phar song phar song //
T09TD4153E:210a-26: mkhan po las mthu che ba'i lha gang zhig kyang yod dam /
T09TD4153E:210a-28: lha rnams da lta nyid dus stengs lhung bar bya'am ci //
T09TD4153E:210a-29: chu gter rab tu rgyu ba skad cig nyid la skam mam ci //
T09TD4153E:210a-30: bskal pa'i me ni 'od zer 'bar bas rtsva rnams ma lus pa //
T09TD4153E:210a-31: sreg pa bzhin du 'jig rten rnams ni thal bar bya'am ci //
T09TD4153E:210a-32: rig 'dzin ma rang nyid bsams te /
T09TD4153E:210a-33: ji srid 'di ni mthong dug bzhin //
T09TD4153E:210a-34: 'di yi dmod dug ma grol ba //
T09TD4153E:210a-35: de srid 'dir ni bdag gis ni //
T09TD4153E:210a-36: nyes rnams rab tu gsal bar bya //
T09TD4153E:210a-38: nye bar btud de phyag 'tshal nas //
T09TD4153E:210a-39: yab gcig gnang bar mdzod gnang bar mdzod /
T09TD4153E:210a-40: 'dir padma ba t'i dgon pa'i glang po che myos pas gsod pa las /
T09TD4153E:210a-45: lha tshangs pas byin gyi gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu'o //
T09TD4153E:210b-0: drang srong nas 'di ni gzhon nu gtsug na nor @210b bu yin pa de bden nam zhes nges par bltas nas dus so //
T09TD4153E:210b-2: 'di ni mtshungs med dpal dang ldan //
T09TD4153E:210b-3: rtags kyang nor bus rnam par spras //
T09TD4153E:210b-4: ji ltar dpag bsam ljon pa ni //
T09TD4153E:210b-5: bdag gis dug gi sdong por shes //
T09TD4153E:210b-7: bdag dman mi bzod mi shes pa //
T09TD4153E:210b-8: bdag dman shin tu mngon 'dod la //
T09TD4153E:210b-9: gang zhig mi shes dbang gis ni //
T09TD4153E:210b-10: bdag gis sdig pa mngon par byas //
T09TD4153E:210b-11: thal mo sbyar nas kye mag pa skye bo las thos pas /
T09TD4153E:210b-12: nyes par byas pa 'di rnams bzod par mdzod cig / mi shes pa'i dbang gis nye bar byas so //
T09TD4153E:210b-13: bzhad gad pa ni bram ze 'tsho'o snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:210b-14: gzhon nu nas gong ma rnams la nyes pa ma mchis so //
T09TD4153E:210b-17: phan tshun khyod kyang bzod par mdzod cig ces so //
T09TD4153E:210b-19: aa ho gzhon nu ni bstan pa'o //
T09TD4153E:210b-20: bu mo padma ba t'i kye /
T09TD4153E:210b-21: de ring ngo cha yang chog par mdzod //
T09TD4153E:210b-22: srog chags dbang phyug bdag por gyur //
T09TD4153E:210b-23: yang dag pas ni spro bar gyis //
T09TD4153E:210b-24: gzhon nu rang nyid bsams pa yin //
T09TD4153E:210b-25: 'di'i skabs ni 'dir glo bur du byung ngo snyam nas /
T09TD4153E:210b-26: gsal por smras pa kye legs ldan rjes su bsgo bar mdzod cig / bdag lci bdag gis zhes pa'i dus 'das 'gro bar byed do //
T09TD4153E:210b-28: lag pa'i chu 'dzin gang bar gyis la khyod dang btsun mo gnyis kar gshegs shig / gzhon nus rnam par bsams te legs ldan bdag ni rgyal rigs so //
T09TD4153E:210b-30: 'di yang yid kyi mtsho yi ni //
T09TD4153E:210b-31: chu skyes sbubs las yang dag byung //
T09TD4153E:210b-33: de bzhin bdag cag gis kyang thos so //
T09TD4153E:210b-35: legs ldan bdag la lci ba dag gis rjes su gnas pa med do //
T09TD4153E:210b-37: 'di 'ba' zhig ma yin pa rjes su gnang ba ni ri mo 'ongs nas bag mar byas pa ni 'di'o //
T09TD4153E:210b-42: ngo tsha ba dang bcas so //
T09TD4153E:210b-50: kye khyod la chags par gyur pa'i srog ma bsrungs na da ni ji ltar drang srong gi rigs thams cad de bzhin du stongs par 'gyur ro //
T09TD4153E:211a-2: drang srong ni ngu zhing khyod kyi lus dang 'dra ba 'dis ji ltar tshangs par spyod kyang 'joms par byed dam /
T09TD4153E:211a-3: gal te khyod kyis de bzhin du bdag cag rnams la dga' ba mthong ba las /
T09TD4153E:211a-4: slar yang gzhan du byed par 'gyur zhing /
T09TD4153E:211a-5: bdag la 'di ra chen pos yongs su sun 'byin cing de yis bdag 'dir chen por yongs su bslu zhing bsreg nas /
T09TD4153E:211a-6: bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa'i skye bo rnams dang ni me'i nang du rang nyid sbyin sreg du bya'o //
T09TD4153E:211a-8: me khyer la shog shig / bram ze nas /
T09TD4153E:211a-9: bdag ni lta ba mi bzod pas /
T09TD4153E:211a-10: sngon du me'i nang du rab tu 'jug par byed do //
T09TD4153E:211a-11: bzhad gad pa rang nyid kyis bsams pa /
T09TD4153E:211a-12: khyod kyi de nyid legs so //
T09TD4153E:211a-13: 'dren pa nas rang nyid bsams te /
T09TD4153E:211a-14: thams cad kyis yang dag par brdzun par byed do snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:211a-16: legs ldan dag bdag ni gnas gang zhig / cung zad mi sbyin zhes bya med //
T09TD4153E:211a-17: ci'i phyir shin tu snying rje bas //
T09TD4153E:211a-18: de'i phyir bdag ni yongs su spong //
T09TD4153E:211a-19: padma can ni 'dis bdag de bzhin du byas nas mchog tu yang dga'o snyam nas /
T09TD4153E:211a-20: drang srong nas khyod dang bu mo padma can lhan cig tu chos spyod cing dug ni mi spyod /
T09TD4153E:211a-22: khyod kyis slar yang bdag kyang mi grol ba ma yin nam /
T09TD4153E:211a-24: khyod ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs shig / bzhad gad pa dang bram ze dag gar byed do //
T09TD4153E:211a-25: rig 'dzin ma ni bdag gis brtsams pa'i don grub snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:211a-26: padma can ni byed pa pos bdag rjes su bzung ngo snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:211a-28: chos mkhyen pa dang brtse ba yis //
T09TD4153E:211a-29: gtsug na nor bus bdag bzhin du //
T09TD4153E:211a-30: ri dbang mag par byas kyang ni /
T09TD4153E:211a-31: ri bo dran gyur de bzhin min //
T09TD4153E:211a-32: de nas sbyin sreg gi khang par zhugs te cho ga rnams ji lta ba bzhin du bsams te /
T09TD4153E:211a-33: byin gyis brlabs nas thams cad yongs su zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:211a-34: drang srong ni phyogs rnams su nyi ma'i dus tshod du song ngam /
T09TD4153E:211a-36: dus su song zhing bi tsu la'i nags tshal tshogs rnams sngo zhing chu klung 'gram gyi ri mo las //
T09TD4153E:211a-37: glang chen rigs rnams gnyid kyis myos shing mig ni zum byed ri sul gnas rnams su ni 'gro bar byed //
T09TD4153E:211a-38: shal ma k'i rnams kyi ni yal ga sgra bcas sdud cing bcag nas khur ba rnams ni skyes pa yis //
T09TD4153E:211b-0: thub pa rnams @211b kye sems ni tshim byed yid 'phrog gu gul phye ma'i dri bzangs phyogs bcur khyab par gyur //
T09TD4153E:211b-1: 'di ni skye bo dam pa rnams kyi zla ba btsun pa zla ba yis //
T09TD4153E:211b-2: mchog tu gsal bar rab sbyar gar gyis gzhir gar mdzad gar tshogs kyis //
T09TD4153E:211b-3: gang gis legs par 'dran [*'dren] byed chags pa dang bral rgyal ba rnams kyi ni //
T09TD4153E:211b-4: yum gyur rtogs pa mchog gi rin chen bla med de ni thob par 'gyur //
T09TD4153E:211b-5: zhes pa ni thams cad nges par zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:211b-6: yan lag gsum pa rdzogs so /
T09TD4153E:211b-8: // / de nas sbrang gi bu mo rab tu zhugs te /
T09TD4153E:211b-9: ngu zhing grogs mo dga' ma padma can gyis ni de ni lo gcig lhag song ste /
T09TD4153E:211b-10: bdag skal ba dman pas grogs mo dga' ma slar mthong bar 'gyur mi 'gyur ni mi shes so //
T09TD4153E:211b-11: dka' thub kyi nags tshal 'di na thub pa'i skye bos rab tu gang yang bdag ni stong pa snyam du sems so //
T09TD4153E:211b-12: de la ji ltar bdag gi gdung ba bsal bar bya /
T09TD4153E:211b-13: yang nas phyogs stong par zhugs nas drag por du bar bya'am snyam ste /
T09TD4153E:211b-14: 'di ni nges pa'i don du slar bya'o snyam nas yongs su zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:211b-15: skyed mos tshal 'di na sant'a na'i ljon pa 'di ni grogs mo dga' ma byis pa'i dus su yang dag par bskrun pa gang yin pa de ni 'di'o //
T09TD4153E:211b-17: bdag ni skal ba dman te lhan cig tu byas nas grogs mo dga'am padma can gyis khyad par du nye bar bskyed pa'o zhes yang dag par 'khyud nas ngu zhing grogs mo dga' ma ni gang du song /
T09TD4153E:211b-18: khyed rnams kyang 'dir me tog kha 'bus par rigs sam /
T09TD4153E:211b-19: yang na de bzhin grogs mo dga' ma yang nges par 'khrungs par gyur tam zhes rtogs par byed do //
T09TD4153E:211b-20: ji ltar 'di bzhin du thos te shing rnams kyang mtshungs par mdzes par smra'o snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:211b-22: aa ho rmad du byung ba chen po 'khrungs snyam nas /
T09TD4153E:211b-23: sbrang gi bu mos bltas pa na /
T09TD4153E:211b-24: ji ltar bram ze munydza'i bu de nas rab tu zhugs nas aa ho chen po 'khrungs so //
T09TD4153E:211b-25: sbrang gi bu mo nye bar btud nas /
T09TD4153E:211b-26: 'phags pa munydza'i bu la phyag byas so//
T09TD4153E:211b-27: munydza shin tu dga' nas mthong ba'i bde legs 'phel bar gyur cig / khyod kyi grogs mo dga' ma padma can la khye'u zhig btsas so //
T09TD4153E:211b-28: sbrang gi bu mo shin tu dga' nas /
T09TD4153E:211b-29: munydza'i bu khyod kyis bdud rtsi'i char phab bo //
T09TD4153E:211b-30: yang de'i ming cir brjod cing byin gyis brlabs /
T09TD4153E:212a-5: 'di 'ba' zhig las yang gzhan med dam /
T09TD4153E:212a-8: yang gzhan dga' ba ci zhig / munydza nas /
T09TD4153E:212a-9: de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis khye'u'i bzhin mthong nas mnyes te /
T09TD4153E:212a-10: lha gtsug na nor bu rgyal srid la dbang bskur ro //
T09TD4153E:212a-14: de nas 'od kyi blo gros ma dang /
T09TD4153E:212a-15: rgyal po tshangs pas byin gnyis dka' thub kyi tshal du gshegs shing bskyod do //
T09TD4153E:212a-16: de nas gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu'ang yab kyi rjes su 'jug cing gshegs so //
T09TD4153E:212a-17: sbrang gi bu mo ni ngu zhing munydza'i bu bdag gi dga' ma'ang de bzhin nam zhes smra /
T09TD4153E:212a-19: gtam lhag ma ma lus pa smra ba rna ba la zhog cig dang /
T09TD4153E:212a-20: de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis gzhon nu'i skye ba yongs su bsal ba'i phyir rang gi pho brang gi skyed mos tshal du dka' thub kyi nags kyi bya ba byed cing nags na gnas so //
T09TD4153E:212a-21: de nas yab kyi bkas rjes su gnang nas gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu ni srung ma med pa'i mchod sbyin bshams nas mchis so //
T09TD4153E:212a-22: bdag kyang der 'gro bar byed do //
T09TD4153E:212a-23: khyod kyi grogs mo dga' ma la bdag gis ci zhig smra bar bya /
T09TD4153E:212a-25: sngar yang drang srong gi gnas kyi rgyan du gyis shig / munydza nas dman de slar yang bkra shis 'joms pa'o //
T09TD4153E:212a-26: sprang gi bu mo shin tu 'jigs te /
T09TD4153E:212a-27: bdag gis ci zhig smras snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:212a-28: de nas 'dir nang du rab tu zhugs shig / skyes gzhan bskul bar bya'o //
T09TD4153E:212a-29: de'i phyir rab tu zhugs nas song ngo //
T09TD4153E:212a-30: de nas bran po rab tu zhugs nas phar song phar song /
T09TD4153E:212a-31: ci'i phyir lhag par 'tshang zhing 'phul bar byed /
T09TD4153E:212a-32: bram ze'i khang pa der rgyu yang ci byed /
T09TD4153E:212a-33: nges par bltas nas ji ltar bsrungs kyang mi sdod par yongs su 'jug cing /
T09TD4153E:212a-37: gzhan rnams ni sbyin sreg byed cing /
T09TD4153E:212a-38: bram ze 'grangs par dga' ba rnams thams cad za 'dod nas 'dir ji ltar bram ze 'khyams po rnams seng ge'i gdan gyi steng du sdod /
T09TD4153E:212a-40: re bram ze rnams phar bur phar zur /
T09TD4153E:212a-41: dmod pa'i rma rnams na nas gar byed do //
T09TD4153E:212a-42: ngan pa rnams pa la ci ste sdigs par byed ces smra'o //
T09TD4153E:212b-0: @212b des blon po sna chen po lag bzangs nges par 'ongs pa mthong nas 'di rnams de la smra'o snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:212b-1: de nas lag bzangs rab tu zhugs nas aa re lus ngan po phar zur phar zur /
T09TD4153E:212b-2: 'dir spro bas don gang ji ltar 'dod pas ster ba la ci'i phyir slong mo pa rnams yongs su sun 'byin par byed /
T09TD4153E:212b-3: 'di rnams kyi don du de bzhin du yang dag par brtsams pa ste /
T09TD4153E:212b-4: gzhon nu gtsug na nor bus 'gog pa med pa'i mchod sbyin thams cad rang len gyi /
T09TD4153E:212b-5: yon tan 'di ni lha yis 'gro ba ma lus pa'i mngon 'dod yongs su 'gengs pa mtshan du bcings pa yin no //
T09TD4153E:212b-6: cho ga 'di la slong mo pa rnams la de bzhin du cung zad ni los kyang ster /
T09TD4153E:212b-7: sngon yang 'dis de bzhin du mdzad nas ji ltar 'dod pa 'dzin par byed do //
T09TD4153E:212b-8: de rnams kyi 'di glo bur du byung ba ma yin no //
T09TD4153E:212b-9: 'di la rab tu zhugs nas de ring gis lo lnga song ngo //
T09TD4153E:212b-10: bran pho ni ji ltar 'di yang rnam par khros na de bzhin du 'dir gzhan yang mi rnyed do snyam nas /
T09TD4153E:212b-11: de nas bros nas song ngo //
T09TD4153E:212b-12: lag bzangs yongs su zhugs te /
T09TD4153E:212b-13: lha gtsug na nor bus sbyin ba rnams rnam par lta ba la bdag bskos pa yin pas de rnams ji srid blta'o snyam nas nges par bltas pa na shin tu dga' ste /
T09TD4153E:212b-14: aa ho di ring lha'i phun sum tshogs pa chen po ni gang gis ji lta ba de bzhin du /
T09TD4153E:212b-15: ji ltar 'dod pa len pas kyang zad par ma gyur to //
T09TD4153E:212b-17: gser gyi phung po rnams ni 'di na rab tu mtho zhing ri rab dang ni 'gran pa ltar //
T09TD4153E:212b-18: rin chen rnams kyi phung po 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba nyi ma'i 'od kyang zil gyis gnon //
T09TD4153E:212b-19: mu tig mchog zlum do shal tshogs rnams bkod pa 'od zer 'tsher ba skar ma'i phreng ba bzhin //
T09TD4153E:212b-20: skye bo rnams ni gang zhig rang dbang blangs nas rang khyim bzhin du dal bus 'gro bar byed //
T09TD4153E:212b-21: yongs su zhugs nas gzhan yang bltas pa na //
T09TD4153E:212b-22: glang chen dbang po rnams kyis myos pa'i chang ni sa la bar med rab tu 'bab pa len byed pas //
T09TD4153E:212b-23: myur 'gro'i lus ni rnam par ring rnams rmig pa'i rnams nges par 'gred pas ngo mtshar rab tu bcas //
T09TD4153E:212b-24: shing rta rnams ni rgya nag ba dan mdangs ldan rnams ni rgyug cing bskyod pa g-yer ka'i sgra bcas la //
T09TD4153E:212b-25: bram ze rnams kyis rab bskyod 'khor lo'i mu khyud sgra yis sa chen nor ldan rab tu g-yo ba ltar //
T09TD4153E:213a-0: brgya byin gyis mchod sbyin brgya rab tu byin pa de 'dir sa'i mthil du lha la bdag gis @213a * //
T09TD4153E:213a-3: ji ltar mtshan nyid 'di lta bu ni ku ru'i rgyal po bzod par dka' ba gang zhig gis mi bzod par mi 'gyur ram /
T09TD4153E:213a-4: 'on kyang des cung zad kyang mi 'gyur ro snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:213a-5: yongs su zhugs pa na der sbyin sreg gi khang par lha nyid rab tu zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:213a-6: rang 'od dpal dang byams pa yis //
T09TD4153E:213a-7: tshangs pa'i zhi ba las kyang rgyal //
T09TD4153E:213a-8: bden pas sa chen las rgyal nas //
T09TD4153E:213a-9: chos ni mngon sum bzhin du gnas //
T09TD4153E:213a-10: ji srid bdag nyid nye bar btud do //
T09TD4153E:213a-14: mkhan po rnams rab tu zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:213a-17: mchod sbyin rnams la lag bzangs nye bar btud nas phyag 'tshal te /
T09TD4153E:213a-18: rgyal po chen po rgyal bar gyur cig / rgyal bar gyur cig / lha nyid kyi bkas rjes su bsgo nas sbyin pa'i sa gzhi rnams bdag gis bltas so //
T09TD4153E:213a-20: de na yang ni slong ba rnams //
T09TD4153E:213a-21: rang gi khyim bzhin rab zhugs nas //
T09TD4153E:213a-22: ji ltar mngon 'dod yongs blangs shing //
T09TD4153E:213a-25: lha mngon par 'dod pa phun sum tshogs te /
T09TD4153E:213a-26: dpal ni gang zhig sa bdag rnams kyis sa stengs nas //
T09TD4153E:213a-27: rab 'bad rnyed rnams kun la bde bar nyer bsnyen gyur //
T09TD4153E:213a-28: skye bo rnams kyis rab tu zhugs pas khyim khyim rnams //
T09TD4153E:213a-29: da ni khyod pas kyang ni de rnams shin tu lhag / rgyal po nas /
T09TD4153E:213a-30: 'di ni cung zad kyang ma yin te /
T09TD4153E:213a-31: 'dir phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams ni thams cad kyi thun mong ste /
T09TD4153E:213a-33: de bzhin du 'jig rten rnams ni mthu che ste /
T09TD4153E:213a-34: rang dbang ba'i dngos po yang de bzhin du bdag gi sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes sgrogs par byed do //
T09TD4153E:213a-36: 'jig rten kun gyi spyi yi ni //
T09TD4153E:213a-37: phyi rol dngos rnams de bdag gis //
T09TD4153E:213a-38: 'jig rten sred pas rnam bslus nas //
T09TD4153E:213a-40: bdag gis ni snying po med cing mi dran pa'i lus 'di yang /
T09TD4153E:213a-41: 'gro ba'i don grub phyir ni rtag tu yongs su gtong //
T09TD4153E:213a-42: gang gang 'di ni ji lta ji ltar mngon 'dod pa //
T09TD4153E:213a-43: de dang de yi de lta de ltar rab tu sbyor //
T09TD4153E:213a-45: yol ba'i nang du k'a la k'a la'i sgra'o //
T09TD4153E:213a-46: thams cad shin tu 'jigs nas phyogs rnams su blta'o //
T09TD4153E:213b-0: rgyal po ni skabs ma yin par de bzhin du gnyid rnam par yur @213b ro ;
T09TD4153E:213b-1: /'jig rten rnams ni yongs su g-yo'o //
T09TD4153E:213b-2: mkhan po ni gus shing 'bad pas sbyin sreg byed /
T09TD4153E:213b-3: aa shoo aa shoo sha ta ces so //
T09TD4153E:213b-5: kye na mnyam ya mtshan che /
T09TD4153E:213b-7: rlung ni drang pos rnam par bskyod pa yes //
T09TD4153E:213b-8: chu gter skye bo dang bcas chu rnams ni //
T09TD4153E:213b-9: dba' rlabs phreng bas yongs su bskyod pa yis //
T09TD4153E:213b-10: gru bzhin nor ldan shin tu g-yo bar gyur //
T09TD4153E:213b-12: na mnyam khyod kyis legs par brtags te /
T09TD4153E:213b-13: drag byung chu yi phung po rlung gis yongs su bskyod pa yi //
T09TD4153E:213b-14: dba' rlabs rab tu 'khrugs ltar sa chen yang dag rnam par g-yo //
T09TD4153E:213b-15: gang las de ring 'di rnams mtho dang dam 'gyur gru bzhin byed //
T09TD4153E:213b-16: 'jig rten rnams ni chang gis myos bzhin lus ni rnam par g-yo //
T09TD4153E:213b-17: padma can ni ha bu padma skyes gong du song ngam zhes smra /
T09TD4153E:213b-18: de nas g-yog mos padma skyes lag pa nas bzung nas rab tu zhugs nas gzhon nu padma skyes ni 'di'o zhes so //
T09TD4153E:213b-20: 'phags pa 'di ci zhig / lha mo ni bu'i lag pa nas bzung nas /
T09TD4153E:213b-21: rgyal po'i drung du nye bar btud nas /
T09TD4153E:213b-22: rje'i sras 'di bzhin du 'khrug pa 'di ci zhig /'dren pa ni padma can gyi lag pa nas bzung nas /
T09TD4153E:213b-24: aa yig 'jigs can re zhig ltos dang /
T09TD4153E:213b-25: sngon ma mthong pa'i rmad du byung ba dga' ba'i gnas skabs kyi mthar thug pa 'di lta ste /
T09TD4153E:213b-26: sa gzhi'i dba' rlabs rim pa mtho dang dma' ba rnam pa rab tu mang po rnams //
T09TD4153E:213b-27: khang bzangs gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan cod pan rnams ni bskyod pa'i rim pa ltar //
T09TD4153E:213b-28: sgra chen rab tu 'jug pa sprin rnams kyis ni 'brug sgra drag tu sgrogs pa ltar //
