T09TD4153E:213b-29: 'di rnams chu gter 'dra zhing mi mtshungs khyad par slar yang 'jig rten mi ltung tsam //
T09TD4153E:213b-31: khang pa'i phreng ba rnams ni 'phred la 'gyel zhing slar yang langs //
T09TD4153E:213b-32: chu bo rnams ni gyen du 'phar zhing gzhan du'ang 'gro mi byed //
T09TD4153E:213b-33: sa chen mtho dang dma' ba rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa ni //
T09TD4153E:213b-34: me long nang gi gzugs brnyan rnam par g-yo ba rtog pa ltar //
T09TD4153E:213b-37: shar gyi phyogs rnams ri yi 'gram bcas 'og tu 'gro byed nub phyogs nam mkha' la ni rab tu 'gro //
T09TD4153E:213b-38: rnam par g-yo bas lho phyogs dma' bar ltung zhing byang phyogs 'di rnams shin tu rab tu mthon por 'gro //
T09TD4153E:214a-0: chu gter g-yo bas dbus ni 'og tu rab tu 'gro zhing mtha' yi @214a * //
T09TD4153E:214a-1: phyogs rnams steng du rab tu 'gro //
T09TD4153E:214a-2: 'di rnams kyang ni steng dang 'og tu reg ste chu 'dzin mthar thug phyogs kyi mthar thug pa //
T09TD4153E:214a-3: rgyal po ni ngo mtshar nas phyi rol du nye bar byung ste 'jig rten pa rnams la dbugs 'byin pa mdzad do //
T09TD4153E:214a-4: lag bzangs ni lha'i bkas ji ltar bsgo nas nges par zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:214a-5: rgyal po ni legs ldan nor 'dzin ma la mchod yon phul nas /
T09TD4153E:214a-6: skye dgu rnams la ltas ngan gang yin de 'bras bdag smin nas //
T09TD4153E:214a-7: bdag gi sbyin gnas rjes bzung skye bo rnams la 'byung ma gyur //
T09TD4153E:214a-8: 'dir ni skye bo'i mngon par 'dod rnams rab tu rdzogs bya'i phyir //
T09TD4153E:214a-9: gal te skye bo 'di rnams nyes na'ang bdag gi mngon 'dod cha //
T09TD4153E:214a-10: mkhan po ni gus pa dang bcas nas sbyin sreg byed //
T09TD4153E:214a-11: aindra a'a gatstsha ha re a'a gatstsha me me dha ti the me she bri sha n'am pa shya me //
T09TD4153E:214a-13: me'i thab khung la bltas nas 'jigs pas phyir 'phar ro //
T09TD4153E:214a-14: bzhad gad pa shin tu 'jigs nas kye na mnyam ltos ltos /
T09TD4153E:214a-15: 'di ni 'jigs shing kha yi sgo nas mche ba rab tu gtsigs //
T09TD4153E:214a-16: mig ni nyin byed gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra zhing rab tu dmar //
T09TD4153E:214a-17: shin tu 'jigs chen gad rgyangs nges par rab tu sgrogs //
T09TD4153E:214a-18: 'dir ni sbyin sreg thab khung gyes nas yang dag byung bar gyur //
T09TD4153E:214a-19: de nas srin po rab tu zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:214a-20: aa ho hu ta ma ho da ta h'um zhes gar byed cing //
T09TD4153E:214a-21: 'byung bzhi 'di rnams gom pa'i stobs kyis rab 'jig cing //
T09TD4153E:214a-22: bar snang 'di rnams 'od zer mngon par 'bar bar bya //
T09TD4153E:214a-23: phyogs kyi 'khor lo lag pa rab brkyang sdud byed cing //
T09TD4153E:214a-24: 'gro ba ma lus bdag gis rnam par g-yo bar bya //
T09TD4153E:214a-27: dge ba byed pa la bgegs mang ngo zhes brjod pa 'di bden par 'dug go zhes gsungs so //
T09TD4153E:214a-28: padma can ni shin tu 'jigs nas byis ba'i gdong la gos kyis bkab ste rgyal po'i rgyab tu 'ongs so //
T09TD4153E:214a-30: kye sems can chen po dgos pa ci'i ched du 'dir 'ongs /
T09TD4153E:214a-32: khyod kyis thams cad rab tu 'jug pa'i tshul khang pa chen po byas nas dgos pa ci'i ched du 'ongs kyang 'dri bar byed dam /
T09TD4153E:214a-33: rgyal po ni shin tu mnyes nas gal te khyod kyis slong du 'ongs sam /
T09TD4153E:214a-34: ci slong ba smros shig / srin po nas /
T09TD4153E:214a-36: bzhad gad pa 'dren pa'i rgyab tu shin tu 'jigs nas 'ongs te tshul gyi khang par zas la song zhes smra /
T09TD4153E:214b-0: bdag gi @214b zas ni gzhan yin nam /
T09TD4153E:214b-1: rgyal po nas smros shig / srin po nas /
T09TD4153E:214b-2: sha ni mdangs ldan slar yang ral gri'i lo mas sngon nyid du //
T09TD4153E:214b-3: rnam bcad rab tu mang po dron po mdog ni dmar po rnams //
T09TD4153E:214b-4: mi yi dbang po srin po rnams kyi bza' ba de rnams yin //
T09TD4153E:214b-5: mi yi bza' ba'i rigs rnams bdag la nges par ci zhig bya //
T09TD4153E:214b-6: rgyal po shin tu mnyes nas /
T09TD4153E:214b-7: tshur shog mkhas pa yid kyi shing rta rdzogs par bya //
T09TD4153E:214b-8: tshur shog bza' ba ji ltar 'dod bzhin lus 'di ni //
T09TD4153E:214b-9: pha rol don phyir bdag gis 'di ni nye bar bsrungs //
T09TD4153E:214b-10: sha rnams bcad pas bdag ni yun ring 'bras bcas 'gyur //
T09TD4153E:214b-11: padma can du zhing rje'i sras khyod kyi di ring tshul lugs 'di ci zhig / rgyal po nas /
T09TD4153E:214b-12: lha mo skyes pa de'i 'bras bu dang bcas so //
T09TD4153E:214b-14: kye na mnyam ji ltar gcig gi don gyi phyir 'jig rten 'di rnams yongs su gtong ngam /
T09TD4153E:214b-16: bdag ni de bzhin gang du yang //
T09TD4153E:214b-18: de yi phyir na skye bo 'di //
T09TD4153E:214b-19: zug rdu zhi phyir bdag nyid gtong //
T09TD4153E:214b-21: bdag ni de lta bu'i mchod sbyin gyi cho ga 'di mi byed do //
T09TD4153E:214b-22: 'dir ni phyugs gsod len pa'i phyir //
T09TD4153E:214b-23: bgegs ni nges par rnam par zhugs //
T09TD4153E:214b-24: 'di yi cho ga rig byed las //
T09TD4153E:214b-25: 'di la phyugs ni sbyin par bshad //
T09TD4153E:214b-27: gang zhig dgos 'dod bgegs yin na //
T09TD4153E:214b-28: bdag ni bgegs kyang mchog tu mos //
T09TD4153E:214b-29: gang la yid kyi shing rta 'grub //
T09TD4153E:214b-30: cho ga de bzhin drag tu zhog / slar yang /
T09TD4153E:214b-31: kye yi bram ze mchod sbyin la //
T09TD4153E:214b-32: srin po phyugs rnams ci phyir rung //
T09TD4153E:214b-33: yang na bdud rtsi spangs nas ni //
T09TD4153E:214b-34: snying po med pas ci zhig bya //
T09TD4153E:214b-36: bho khyod 'dir ci'i phyir gtam skom pos dus 'phrog par byed //
T09TD4153E:214b-38: bho 'dir mchog gi tshes grangs la /
T09TD4153E:214b-39: lus las ji ltar 'dod pa nye bar spyod cig padma can ni du zhing skal ba dman pa bdag gi lus 'di yang re zhig dang por nye bar bza' bar gyis shig / rgyal po nas /
T09TD4153E:214b-44: ai: mya ngan gyis 'jigs pa'i bag chags can 'dis ci zhig bya /
T09TD4153E:214b-47: mya ngan byas pa'i sha ni bska dang kha zhing tsha ba'i ngo rnams yang dag bro bar byed //
T09TD4153E:214b-48: chags pa can ni sla zhing khu bar byas bzhin rab tu skrag bcas de ni bskams pa 'dra //
T09TD4153E:215a-1: pa'i skyur zhing rab tu tsha dang rtsub rtsub brod med zos nas brang ni tsha bar byed //
T09TD4153E:215a-2: mchog tu byams pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi lus ni mngar zhing dbang po thams cad mchog tu tshim //
T09TD4153E:215a-3: rgyal po shin tu ma nyes nas /
T09TD4153E:215a-4: ring mo nas slong ba'i skye bo mngon shes can re zhig bdag gis mthong ngo zhes nas mtshon thogs te sha gcod par byas pa na /
T09TD4153E:215a-5: padma can ni lag pa nas bzung nas /
T09TD4153E:215a-6: rje'i sras ma bsams par ma byed cig ces smra zhing /
T09TD4153E:215a-7: kye sems can chen po 'phags pa'i bu yongs su thong la bdag longs shig zer /
T09TD4153E:215a-9: bho la kkha r'a ksha sa 'phags pa thong la bdag longs shig zer /
T09TD4153E:215a-11: bho sems can chen po grogs po thong la bdag zo cig zer /
T09TD4153E:215a-13: ma 'brel ba smra ba des chog chog / lha mo bdag gi chos kyi bgegs ma byed cig ces gsungs /
T09TD4153E:215a-14: padma can ni rmongs nas gar byed /
T09TD4153E:215a-15: bzhad gad pa ni gzhon nu'i gdong gos kyis g-yogs par byed do //
T09TD4153E:215a-17: bho sems can chen po gnas skabs 'dir bdag gi sha la nye bar sbyor bar gyis shig / srin po ni bdag nyid bsams te /
T09TD4153E:215a-18: 'di ltar khyod ni sems can chen po ste /
T09TD4153E:215a-19: bdag ni ma yin no snyam nas /
T09TD4153E:215a-20: nye bar za zhing gar byed do //
T09TD4153E:215a-21: rab tu gsal bar smras pa /
T09TD4153E:215a-22: aa ha ha 'dis shin tu ring por tshim par byas so //
T09TD4153E:215a-24: legs ldan 'jig rten skyong ba rnams yongs su bskyab par mdzod /
T09TD4153E:215a-26: bdag ni na mnyam dga' ba'i srog 'dor bar byed do //
T09TD4153E:215a-28: 'dir bsdad nas ci zhig bya zhes nas nges par song ngo //
T09TD4153E:215a-29: srin po ni de nas re zhig tshim mo //
T09TD4153E:215a-31: kye dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'di ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du nye bar spyod cig ces lus gtad nas brgyal te gar byed do //
T09TD4153E:215a-35: sems can chen po yun ring por nyon mongs par mi rigs so snyam nas nges par song ngo //
T09TD4153E:215a-36: mi mngon tsam na zhugs nas /
T09TD4153E:215a-37: brgya byin gyi gzugs su bstan nas /
T09TD4153E:215a-38: kye rgyal po chen po nye bar bzhengs shig nye bar bzhengs shig / rgyal po nas /
T09TD4153E:215a-39: bdag ni rjes su bzung zhing rab tu dga' bas lus la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin nye bar longs spyod cig / brgya byin nas bdag ni srin po ma lags te /
T09TD4153E:215b-0: slar yang legs par 'ongs ba 'di gang zhig / bzhad @215b gdab nas /
T09TD4153E:215b-1: dbugs phyung shig / dbugs phyung shig / kye na mnyam dga' ba 'di ni nges par lha'i rgyal po bdag nyid byon no //
T09TD4153E:215b-2: lha bzhengs par mdzod cig / kye 'phags pa'i bu'i mdzad spyod 'di ni lha bas lhag par lha rnams la sgrogs par byed do //
T09TD4153E:215b-3: padma can ni rgyal po la bltas nas ngu zhing 'phags pa'i bu 'di lta bu mthong nas /
T09TD4153E:215b-4: bdag gi lus ma nyams par gnas so snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:215b-6: kye lha'i rgyal po rab tu dgos pa ci'i phyir 'dir byon /
T09TD4153E:215b-8: khyod kyi bsam pa'i mthu mi g-yo ba la nor 'dzin dang /
T09TD4153E:215b-9: ri rab dag kyang g-yos te /
T09TD4153E:215b-12: ro ldan mthil nas mngon sum kun nas gsal bar bya ba'i phyir 'ongs te /
T09TD4153E:215b-13: rnam par spyod pa 'di ni bdag gi mig 'phrul ba yin no /
T09TD4153E:215b-16: gzhan yang ya mtshan che ba 'dir ni sprin gyi 'khor lo rlung drag pos bskyod pa ltar 'ur 'ur zhes rnam par bzlog par rtsom par byed do //
T09TD4153E:215b-18: kye ma 'jig rten rnams sdug bsngal gyis gdung bar byed dam zhes gsungs /
T09TD4153E:215b-21: bzhad gad pa nas gzigs gzigs /
T09TD4153E:215b-22: ston ka'i zla ba gang ba'i 'od ltar dkar zhing skar ma'i phreng ba'i do shal gyis nye bar brgyan cing gsal ba ltar /
T09TD4153E:215b-23: rin po che'i 'od zer khyad par rab tu gsal ba nor rgyas kyi gdengs ka'i dkyil 'khor ltar dkar po yang dag par 'thon nas 'byung ngo //
T09TD4153E:215b-24: rgyal po ni shin tu ya mtshan che nas /
T09TD4153E:215b-26: 'dir gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes so //
T09TD4153E:215b-28: kye bud med rin po che lha mo padma can gyi dbyibs lta bu zhig sa gzhi'i mthil nas yang dag par langs nas byung ngo //
T09TD4153E:215b-29: kye na mnyam dga' ba gzigs mdzod /
T09TD4153E:215b-30: rgyal po ni ya mtshan che nas /
T09TD4153E:215b-32: ro ldan mthil nas mngon sum du //
T09TD4153E:215b-33: 'dir ni dpal mo bzhengs sam ci //
T09TD4153E:215b-34: yang na 'di ni rnam gsal ba //
T09TD4153E:215b-35: sa chen lhag pa'i ska rags sam //
T09TD4153E:215b-36: de nas sa'i lha mo rab tu zhugs nas mchod yon phul te skyes bu chen po chur gshegs /
T09TD4153E:215b-39: kye khyod ni 'dir gsar du 'ongs pa ste /
T09TD4153E:215b-40: legs ldan grong 'jig dang gnyis po bdag gis mchod par bgyi'o //
T09TD4153E:215b-42: ji ltar bas sa rnam dag pas //
T09TD4153E:216a-2: de bzhin mchod pas tshim byas kyang //
T09TD4153E:216a-3: mchog tu dga' ba thob ma yin //
T09TD4153E:216a-5: khyod di ring de tsam slar yang rnam par g-yo ba ci'i phyir lags /
T09TD4153E:216a-6: sa nas khyod kyi sems pa rgya chen mthong bas rab dga' nas //
T09TD4153E:216a-7: chu gter ri bo nags tshal mthar thug mngon par bskyod //
T09TD4153E:216a-8: khyod kyi ltad mo ya mtshan ngo mtshar lta ba yis //
T09TD4153E:216a-9: rab dga'i khur gyis lus non dbang gis yongs su 'dar //
T09TD4153E:216a-10: de nas da ni bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis lus slar yang gsar par bya'o zhes /
T09TD4153E:216a-11: 'dren pa'i lus la yongs su byug pa byas so //
T09TD4153E:216a-12: bzhad gad pa shin tu dga' ste /
T09TD4153E:216a-13: na mnyam dga' ba ji lta ba de bzhin du mthong bar gyur to //
T09TD4153E:216a-15: legs ldan gyi chos kyi mthu'o //
T09TD4153E:216a-17: shin tu dka' ba spyad pa 'di'i las kyi tshul 'di ni cung zad las med do //
T09TD4153E:216a-18: sa nas lha'i dbang po 'di ni 'di la dga' ba med de gzigs mdzod //
T09TD4153E:216a-19: koo shi ka 'di yis sngon dus nas //
T09TD4153E:216a-20: 'di bzhin lus ni stong phrag smin par byas //
T09TD4153E:216a-21: sngon yang dri ma bsnyil bzhin spangs pa ni //
T09TD4153E:216a-22: bdag gi sa phyogs 'ga' yang de yod min //
T09TD4153E:216a-23: slar yang rgyal po mthong bas 'dir rmad du byung ngo //
T09TD4153E:216a-24: bdag ni 'gro bar byed do zhes nas song ngo //
T09TD4153E:216a-25: brgya byin nas rgyal po rang gi bsod nams bsags pa des //
T09TD4153E:216a-26: mtho ris su yang dag par gshegs par mdzod cig / rgyal po nas /
T09TD4153E:216a-27: de na slong mo ba yod dam ci byed brgya byin nas de med do //
T09TD4153E:216a-28: rgyal po nas gal te de bzhin yin na 'gro bar mi byed do //
T09TD4153E:216a-29: brgya byin nas der pha ma dag 'gro bar mos sam /
T09TD4153E:216a-30: lci ba dag ji ltar 'dod par ro //
T09TD4153E:216a-31: brgya byin nas de bzhin 'dir 'gro bar bya'o zhes nas yongs su song ngo ;
T09TD4153E:216a-32: / de nas ji ltar bu med pa'i legs ldan 'od zer zhes pa'i drang srong rab tu zhugs nas /
T09TD4153E:216a-33: aa ho rgyal po chen po'i bsam pa rab tu rgya che'o zhes rab tu zhugs te /
T09TD4153E:216a-34: kye rgyal po chen po bde legs su gyur cig / rgyal pos phyag byas nas /
T09TD4153E:216a-36: drang srong nas 'dir khyod kyi btsun mo dang bu'i ched du 'ongs so //
T09TD4153E:216a-37: padma can ni 'di ci zhig snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:216a-38: rgyal po ni shin tu dga' nas legs ldan bdag gi lus la sogs pa 'di slong ba kun gyi rang dbang ngo //
T09TD4153E:216a-39: de nas yol ba las ca co'i sgra'o //
T09TD4153E:216a-40: kye re zhig mchod sbyin gyi cho ga'i btsun mo gtong ba med /
T09TD4153E:216a-42: slong na sbyin par mi bya zhes//
T09TD4153E:216b-0: @216b 'di ni chos kyis cho gar med //
T09TD4153E:216b-2: phar zur bram ze gdug pa phar zur phar zur /
T09TD4153E:216b-3: rgyal po'i btsun mos khyod la ci zhig bya /
T09TD4153E:216b-5: rgyal po nas de skad ma zer cig / drang srong chen po bdag snying yang //
T09TD4153E:216b-6: ji ltar 'dod bzhin legs ldan long /
T09TD4153E:216b-8: bu mo padma pa t'i dang /
T09TD4153E:216b-9: bu padma autta ra tshur shog shig / khyed gnyis rgyal pos byin no //
T09TD4153E:216b-10: padma can du zhing rgyal po chen po bdag po ni yin mod kyi /
T09TD4153E:216b-11: 'on kyang rgyal po'i gdung rgyud 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T09TD4153E:216b-13: bdag ni mi sbyin zhes pa cung zad kyang med do zhes bshad zin to //
T09TD4153E:216b-14: padma can nas longs shig / de bzhin du du nas ci zhig bya /
T09TD4153E:216b-15: bu padma skyes tshur shog /'phags pa'i bus bdag cag yongs su btang zin gyis /
T09TD4153E:216b-16: yab la legs su ltos shig / phyi nas ni mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
T09TD4153E:216b-17: padma skyes nas ci ste phyi nas bdag gis yab mthong bar mi byed /
T09TD4153E:216b-19: padma skyes gang gi phyir na /
T09TD4153E:216b-20: 'dis bdag cag yongs su btang gis gzhan du 'gro'o //
T09TD4153E:216b-25: yab kyang de bzhin du 'gro bar byed dam /
T09TD4153E:216b-27: padma skyes kyis don ni mi shes par shes nas bu yab la phyag 'tshol cig zer /
T09TD4153E:216b-28: padma skyes ni thal mo sbyar nas /
T09TD4153E:216b-29: yab bdag gi yum 'di tsam bshums pa ci ste /
T09TD4153E:216b-31: kye ma khyod ni snying rje med //
T09TD4153E:216b-32: gang zhig 'di bzhin tshe nge yis //
T09TD4153E:216b-33: bshums shing byis pa yongs su btang //
T09TD4153E:216b-34: h'a kye padma ba t'i dang /
T09TD4153E:216b-36: khyed cag gnyis po dag yin no //
T09TD4153E:216b-37: bram ze'i bu bdag cag kyang khyed cag gi rjes su 'gro bar bya'o zhes rmongs nas gar byed do //
T09TD4153E:216b-38: drang srong nas shog shog / bu mo bdag cag rnams 'gro bar bya ba ring por 'gro dgos so //
T09TD4153E:216b-39: rgyal po ni padma skyes kyi spyi bo la bsnoms nas bshums shing /
T09TD4153E:216b-40: nags sam yang na grong khyer ram //
T09TD4153E:216b-41: ri bo dang ni rgya mtsho'ang rung //
T09TD4153E:216b-42: khyed cag nyal zhing gnyid log kyang //
T09TD4153E:216b-43: lha rnams kyis ni bsrung bar shog / lha mo khyod ni gar gnas der //
T09TD4153E:216b-44: gzhon nu 'di la rdeg ma byed //
T09TD4153E:216b-45: lha mo ni bsting tshig gis 'phags pa'i bu de bzhin du'ang mkhyen nam /
T09TD4153E:216b-47: khyed kyi srog ni yongs 'dor kyang //
T09TD4153E:216b-48: drang srong chen po'i bka' ma 'da' //
T09TD4153E:216b-49: me yi gzugs dang 'dra ba yi //
T09TD4153E:217a-2: bsod nams yongs su bsgrubs byas pas //
T09TD4153E:217a-4: drang srong nas bu mo longs shig / bdag cag 'gro bar bya'o //
T09TD4153E:217a-6: lha mo gshegs par mdzod cig / padma can ni phyag 'tshal te /
T09TD4153E:217a-7: rgyal rigs skye ba'i mthar thug par //
T09TD4153E:217a-8: bdag kyang de bzhin rjes 'jug shog / ces so //
T09TD4153E:217a-10: yab kyi nga la sngon ni rta sbyin zer nas ma byin pas nga khyod nga la nam ster /
T09TD4153E:217a-11: rgyal po ni bshums shing padma can la 'khyud nas bu de thub pa 'dis khyod la ster bar 'gyur gyis /
T09TD4153E:217a-17: rta'i sga 'di rnams tshags gyis shig ces zer /
T09TD4153E:217a-18: rgyal po rang nyid bsams pa na //
T09TD4153E:217a-19: skabs 'di bdag gi zug rngu ni //
T09TD4153E:217a-20: srog la bab kyang de bzhin min //
T09TD4153E:217a-21: ji ltar pha yi mnyes gshin pa'i //
T09TD4153E:217a-24: bu mo shog / bdag cag 'gro bar bya'o //
T09TD4153E:217a-25: padma can ni rgyal po la blta zhing /
T09TD4153E:217a-26: bu'i lag pa nas bzung nas song ngo //
T09TD4153E:217a-28: brtse ba'i zhags pas legs bsdams bzhin /
T09TD4153E:217a-29: gang gis bdag kyang shin tu gdung //
T09TD4153E:217a-30: na mnyam dbugs phyung shig dbugs phyung shig / bzhad gad pa brtabs bzhin du longs nas kye mi ster ci zhig zer /
T09TD4153E:217a-31: rgyal po rtab rtab po mdzad nas rnam par bsams pa /
T09TD4153E:217a-32: da ni bdag gi pha ma dag blta bar bya'o snyam pa na pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams rab tu zhugs nas ngo mtshar che ngo mtshar che /
T09TD4153E:217a-33: lha'i yab yum dag nam mkha' la bya ba mdzad pa gzigs mdzod /
T09TD4153E:217a-34: ngang pa'i gzhog pa'i cha yis bskyod bzhin rgyal mtshan phreng ba can //
T09TD4153E:217a-35: gzhal yas khang 'dras ri rab lhun po'i rtse mor rnam par gnas //
T09TD4153E:217a-36: lha yi drang srong rnams kyis mngon dga' brgya phrag rnams kyis bstod //
T09TD4153E:217a-37: 'di dag lha yi gnas su da ni rab tu zhugs par gyur //
T09TD4153E:217a-38: rgyal po shin tu mnyes te gzigs nas phyag 'tshal zhing de bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa 'di nyid klog go //
T09TD4153E:217a-39: slar yang gzigs nas bshums shing /
T09TD4153E:217a-40: yab ni rnam sad lam du ring du gshegs shing /
T09TD4153E:217a-41: yum kyang rjes su gshegs so //
T09TD4153E:217a-42: padma skyes dang lha mo grong khyer spangs shing gnyis skyes khyim du song //
T09TD4153E:217a-43: da ni 'di ni stongs gyur ri bo shin tu dben pa'i nags tshal gyi //
T09TD4153E:217b-0: gnas la bdag @217b kyang rten byed blo ni 'gro bar shin tu rings par gyur //
T09TD4153E:217b-1: zhes gsungs nas yongs su zhugs pa na /
T09TD4153E:217b-3: kye na mnyam khyod kyang gshegs par mdzad na bdag bram ze yongs su 'dor bar byed dam /
T09TD4153E:217b-5: khyod ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin no //
T09TD4153E:217b-6: bzhad gad pa nas bdag bram ze yang gal te khyod kyis 'ga' zhig gi bran la mi ster na rjes su 'gro'o //
T09TD4153E:217b-9: de bzhin du bdag ster ba'i bdag po yang khyod nyid do //
T09TD4153E:217b-10: pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams nas /
T09TD4153E:217b-11: kye gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu khyod kyang bdag cag rnams yongs su 'dor ram /
T09TD4153E:217b-12: nor ldan ri phug khyod nyid ni //
T09TD4153E:217b-13: bsam gtan gyis spyan 'byed mi byed //
T09TD4153E:217b-14: g-yo ba med pa rgya mtsho bzhin //
T09TD4153E:217b-15: nags kyi lha rnams kyis ni lta //
T09TD4153E:217b-16: rgyas pa'i bu rnams bsdus nas gang gis zlos gar rab sbyar la //
T09TD4153E:217b-17: nye bar yongs su rtsom mdzad tsandra go mis rab sbyor dang //
T09TD4153E:217b-18: gal te 'ga' zhig chags pa dang bral mtshungs 'gyur 'gro rnams la //
T09TD4153E:217b-19: yang dag skyes sam sa chen yun ring gnas pas bden par smras //
T09TD4153E:217b-20: 'dir ni thams cad nges par zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:217b-21: yan lag bzhi pa rdzogs so /
T09TD4153E:217b-23: // / de nas rig pa 'dzin pa rab tu zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:217b-24: rtsed mos rol cing mkha' la rgyu ba na aa ho lta gtsug na nor bu'i grags pa rgyun mi 'chad pas phyogs ma lus pa khyab cing gang ba 'di lta ste /
T09TD4153E:217b-25: gtsug na nor bu'i snyan pa'i grags pa chen pos phyogs rnams thams cad rab tu mdzes par brgya na //
T09TD4153E:217b-26: de yis rna ba'i rgyan bzhin gos dang bcas bzhin mnyam bzhin kun nas dgod bcas bzhin //
T09TD4153E:217b-27: tsan dan tshogs rnams bdud rtsis gang dang zla ba'i 'od zer 'tsher bas rnam par byug pa ltar ;
T09TD4153E:217b-28: / do shal rnam par 'phyang ba 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs kyis khyab cing rnam par g-yo ba ltar //
T09TD4153E:217b-29: ltos ltos de yi grags pa nges par 'phel ba ni //
T09TD4153E:217b-30: phyogs phyogs mi'am ci yi bu mo rnams kyis glu len cing //
T09TD4153E:217b-31: ri bo'i rtsel grub pa rig 'dzin rnams ni bstod cing sgrogs //
T09TD4153E:217b-32: sa 'og mthil na gtsug gi nor bu'i 'od zer rab 'bar ba //
T09TD4153E:217b-33: klu rgyal rnams kyi gdengs ka'i dkyil 'khor zhi nas nyan par 'dod //
T09TD4153E:217b-34: rig 'dzin ma nas padma ba t'i ni yugs sa mo ma yin bzhin du bu ni chung ngu dang bcas 'khor thams cad yongs su spangs te /
T09TD4153E:217b-35: bdag po'i bkas drang srong chen po'i rjes su 'brang zhing da lta ji ltar gyur tam /
T09TD4153E:218a-2: de bzhin legs ldan 'od zer can gyi gnas brten nas //
T09TD4153E:218a-3: ri bo gangs ldan mi ring ri sul dag na slar yang gnas //
T09TD4153E:218a-4: drang srong chen po nga yang yab ni srid 'byung yid gcugs so //
T09TD4153E:218a-5: de phyir 'di ni gzhan gyi lag tu 'gro bar mi bya'i phyir //
T09TD4153E:218a-6: drang srong chen pos de nyid slong bar mdzad cing zhugs par nges so //
T09TD4153E:218a-8: padma can ni sngon gyi rigs su rab tu zhugs te /
T09TD4153E:218a-9: de ni sdug bsngal gyi khur bskur dka' ba ni med do //
T09TD4153E:218a-10: de nas da lta lha gtsug na nor bu ji ltar thos sam /
T09TD4153E:218a-11: rig pa 'dzin pa nas de yang padma can gyis gang du khyer dang gnas pa mi shes shing //
T09TD4153E:218a-12: de dang nye ba na de bzhin ri'i phug tu rab tu zhugs nas so sor gnas par gyur //
T09TD4153E:218a-13: de yi rnam par spangs pa'i grong khyer s'a ke ta ni mchod sbyin phun sum tshogs pa rnams //
T09TD4153E:218a-14: shin tu mi bzad bzod par rab tu dka' ba'i rgyal pos mthong nas nye bar bskor bar byas //
T09TD4153E:218a-15: rig 'dzin ma nas rje'i sras 'di'i dga' ba'i gtam 'di sdug par 'gyur ram /
T09TD4153E:218a-17: rig pa 'dzin pas 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste lha'i'o /
T09TD4153E:218a-18: rig pa 'dzin ma nas rje'i sras gang du babs par byed /
T09TD4153E:218a-19: rig 'dzin ma dgod cing 'di khyod kyis smros shig / gang zhig ma la ya yi rtse mo rgya mtsho'i dpa' rlabs 'thor ba'i mdangs can nam //
T09TD4153E:218a-20: ri rab bang rim rnam yangs dga' zhing ya mtshan zhig gam yongs 'du sa brtol ri bo 'am //
T09TD4153E:218a-21: gang zhig sgeg cing gsal la grub pa rnams ni rab dga' ri bo gangs ldan rtse mo'am //
T09TD4153E:218a-22: sa gzhi thams cad bris pa bzhin du nam mkha'i mthil nas lta zhing 'gro bar byed dam ci //
T09TD4153E:218a-24: shin tu phul du byung gnas bdag la yod de gtsug na nor bu mthong ba de ru de bzhin du babs par bya'o //
T09TD4153E:218a-26: legs ldan rnams ni mthong bas kyang //
T09TD4153E:218a-27: dga' 'gyur mngon par brjod pa legs //
T09TD4153E:218a-28: zhes nas yongs su zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:218a-29: ri phug 'di ni chu bo dal gyis 'bab pa yi //
T09TD4153E:218a-30: chu 'thor zer ma bsil zhing rlung ni 'jam pos bskyod //
T09TD4153E:218a-31: ljon shing gzhon nu'ang yal ga rnams ni kha 'bus pa //
T09TD4153E:218a-32: gang de skyes bu seng ge'i nye 'khor gnas yin no //
T09TD4153E:218a-33: rig 'dzin ma rnams rnam par bltas te /
T09TD4153E:218a-34: 'di ni nges par phyag bya ba'i gnas so zhes gnyis pos phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'dzin pas nges par brtags nas /
T09TD4153E:218b-0: 'dir ni de ba d'a ta ljon pa'i @218b bsil grib 'og //
T09TD4153E:218b-1: nor bu mu tig rdo ba dag gi steng na ni //
T09TD4153E:218b-2: padma'i stan can mngon sum bzhin du skyil krung mdzad //
T09TD4153E:218b-3: gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu nye bar zhugs par gyur //
T09TD4153E:218b-5: aa ho de ni shin tu brtan pa zab pa brling ba'i mdzad pa can no //
T09TD4153E:218b-6: 'dis gangs ri thams cad dpal gyis gang bar byas so //
T09TD4153E:218b-7: rje'i sras 'dir me tog 'di rnams gang nas byung /
T09TD4153E:218b-8: rig pa 'dzin pas steng du bltas pa na ya mtshan che ste /
T09TD4153E:218b-9: mkha' las lha rnams me tog char 'bebs shing //
T09TD4153E:218b-10: sems can chen po mngon par mchod par byed //
T09TD4153E:218b-11: de ni de bzhin mchod pa'i don du ni //
T09TD4153E:218b-12: bdag cag kyang ni me tog tshol du 'deng //
T09TD4153E:218b-14: de nas rab tu zhugs pa na 'dres pa ji lta ba mthong ste spyan cung zad phye nas aa ho nad med pa'i bsam gtan bzhi ni 'di lta ste /
T09TD4153E:218b-15: rnam par rtog bcas rnam par dpyod dang g-yo ba'i rlabs //
T09TD4153E:218b-16: dang po yin te dga' bde g-yo bcas gnyis pa'o //
T09TD4153E:218b-17: bde ba la chags 'jig pa'i nad can gsum pa'o //
T09TD4153E:218b-18: rab tu zhi ba ro gcig mthar thug 'di ni bzhi pa'o //
T09TD4153E:218b-20: kye na mnyam khyod rang gcig pu de bzhin du dang po dang /
T09TD4153E:218b-23: bzhi pa'i bsam gtan gyi bde ba thob nas bdag gcig bu 'gengs shing thum por bsdams nas tshong pa bzhin du rnyed pa thob nas gnas par byed dam /
T09TD4153E:218b-24: bdag bram ze la yang bsam gtan cig kyang ma byin zhes zer /
T09TD4153E:218b-25: 'dren pa ni bzhad cing na mnyam pa 'di ni sgom pa'i rjes su 'jug ste /
T09TD4153E:218b-26: gzhan la sbyin par mi nus so //
T09TD4153E:218b-27: phreng ba'i yon tan bdag nyid bzhin //
T09TD4153E:218b-29: 'jig rten kun gyi don bsgrub phyir //
T09TD4153E:218b-30: yid kyi shing rta cis mi bsgrub //
T09TD4153E:218b-32: ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi bde ba thob par 'gyur ba lags /
T09TD4153E:218b-34: gnyis min rten cing 'dod lha'i mtshon rnams bcom //
T09TD4153E:218b-35: bde ba 'di ni rang dbang yod byas nas //
T09TD4153E:218b-36: g-yo ba rnams gsal mtsho chu shin tu dangs //
T09TD4153E:218b-37: bsil bzhin rang gi sems las rab tu skye //
T09TD4153E:218b-40: yul gyi bde ba yang gzhan zhig gam ci /
T09TD4153E:218b-42: khyod ni bdud rtsi dang dug sre bar byed dam ci //
T09TD4153E:218b-43: bsam gtan bde bas yid ni bsil bar byed //
T09TD4153E:218b-44: yul gyis slar yang dbang med sems byed cing //
T09TD4153E:218b-45: 'dod chags zhe sdang me yis rnam bcings shing //
T09TD4153E:219a-0: @219a * // dmyal ba'i me yis sreg par byed pa ltar //
T09TD4153E:219a-2: gal te de bzhin du yin na bdag kyang bsam gtan byed do //
T09TD4153E:219a-4: de bzhin du mdzod cig / bzhad gad pa bsam gtan byed pa na rna bar cung zad thos so //
T09TD4153E:219a-5: kye ngu ba bzhin du thos par byed do //
T09TD4153E:219a-9: khyod kyis ci yang ma thos sam /
T09TD4153E:219a-10: rgyal pos kyang cung zad thos te /
T09TD4153E:219a-11: 'di ni grag pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad nges par bud med du zhing 'dug go //
T09TD4153E:219a-15: yan lag mchog rnams dbyangs snyan zhing //
T09TD4153E:219a-17: bskyed pa rno zhing rnam par gcod //
T09TD4153E:219a-18: skyes bu rnams ni rnam par rtsub //
T09TD4153E:219a-19: na mnyam mi ring bar mnyen pa bzhin du'o //
T09TD4153E:219a-21: 'di'i dbyangs sgrogs tshul ni sngon thos pa cig 'dra ba snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:219a-23: bdag kyang de bzhin du snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:219a-24: de ni dka' thub ma mnar ba zhig ngu ba yin nam /
T09TD4153E:219a-25: der mngon par 'gro bar rigs so //
T09TD4153E:219a-27: kye na mnyam de ba ltas nas ci zhig byed zer /
T09TD4153E:219a-29: legs ldan 'jig rten skyong rnams yongs su skyobs shig yongs su skyobs shig zer /
T09TD4153E:219a-31: skye bo 'di bzhin du mnar ba ci zhig nye bar blta bar rigs so //
T09TD4153E:219a-33: kye khyod ji ltar dus thams cad du gsar bu bzhin du pha rol gyi sdug bsngal gyis bdag nyid sdug bsngal bar byed dam /
T09TD4153E:219a-36: 'khor bar ring du slar yang ni //
T09TD4153E:219a-37: bdag nyid de bzhin skye zhing skyes //
T09TD4153E:219a-38: sems can 'ga' zhig gnyen min pa //
T09TD4153E:219a-39: gang na'ang de ni gcig yod min //
T09TD4153E:219a-40: gnyis po rtab rtab por langs te yongs su zhugs pa na /
T09TD4153E:219a-42: kye 'di ni lha mo padma can la ci zhig rjes su byed pa ma yin nam /
T09TD4153E:219a-43: rgyal po na re khyod ci zhig smra /
T09TD4153E:219a-44: gang na lha mo padma can gang la'o skol gnyis kyang phyogs tsam zhes zer /
T09TD4153E:219a-45: de nas padma can sha ba ri gnyis dang rjes su 'og zhing rab tu zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:219a-47: song mi khyod song zhes skad chen pos smra zhing khyod mi 'gro'am zhes mad m'a da ka zhes pa nas bud med rnyed pa 'dis nga'i bu chung de'i nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma byed do zhes zer /
T09TD4153E:219a-49: ha kyee na de ka la lo la k'a 'di ni'u cag gnyis kyis thob bo //
T09TD4153E:219b-0: ji @219b ltar 'gro ba de ltar 'gror chug zer /
T09TD4153E:219b-1: padma can du zhing kye ma ji ltar 'phags pa'i bu khyod ni yongs su skyob pa'i ngang tshul de lta na skal dman bdag gi gnas skabs 'di lta bur 'jug pa las yongs su skyob par mi byed dam zhes smra /
T09TD4153E:219b-3: kyee ji ltar the tshom byed /
T09TD4153E:219b-5: rgyal pos de la bltas nas rtab rtab por lha mo ma 'jigs shig / padma can ni brtags nas 'phags pa'i bu'am su zhig yin /
T09TD4153E:219b-6: yang na bdag gis 'dir 'ga' zhig la 'phags pa'i bu mo'i zhes nye bar mthong ngam /
T09TD4153E:219b-7: rgyal po ni bshums shing lha mo 'di nye bar mthong ba 'di ni bdag yin te /
T09TD4153E:219b-8: nye du'i skye bo sdug bsngal bar bya'o //
T09TD4153E:219b-10: kye lha mo ji ltar thams cad gzhan yin snyam du ma sems shig /'di na ni mnyam dga' ba'o //
T09TD4153E:219b-11: padma can ni gnyis po la bltas te /
T09TD4153E:219b-12: shin tu sdug bsngal nas sa la 'gyel lo //
T09TD4153E:219b-14: shog mi khyod shog / bzhad gad pa ni dbyug pa gyen du bsgrengs te /
T09TD4153E:219b-15: ha na de bran mo yi bu gdug pa can gyi sha ba ri dag / dbyug ba kyog po lag 'gro khros pa 'dra ba'i dbyug pa 'dis khyed cag gi mgo gzhom par bya'o zhes zer /
T09TD4153E:219b-16: rgyal po na re na mnyam de bzhin du ma byed cig / ji ltar gnod pa byed pas bshes gyur pa //
T09TD4153E:219b-17: de ltar phan pa mdzad pas mi 'gyur snyam //
T09TD4153E:219b-18: gang las de yis bzod par gyur pa yi //
T09TD4153E:219b-19: 'gro ba mtha' dag zlog pa'i rgyu nyid do //
T09TD4153E:219b-20: sha ba ri dag phan chun bltas nas shin tu brten te g-yo bar ga la 'gyur /
T09TD4153E:219b-21: de ltar na bdag cag 'gro bar bya'o //
T09TD4153E:219b-22: 'di ni bdag cag dbang pos sprul pa byas zer /
T09TD4153E:219b-23: 'jigs pas gar byed cing nges par zhugs te song ngo //
T09TD4153E:219b-25: aa yi lha mo 'dir ci'i phyir ji ltar 'di 'dra ba'i skabs su zhugs /
T09TD4153E:219b-26: padma can du zhing 'phags pa'i bu bdag gi skal ba la dri bar mdzod //
T09TD4153E:219b-28: kya lha mo gzhon nu padma skyes ji ltar /
T09TD4153E:219b-29: padma can phyogs rnams su bltas nas skal ba dman pa bdag la da gzod gtam ci zhig / rgyal po rtab rtab por bu ci ci zhes smra /
T09TD4153E:219b-31: bu padma skyes de ring gang na zhes smra /
T09TD4153E:219b-33: ci ci kye lha mo smros shig padma can nas /
T09TD4153E:219b-34: bdag gi bu padma skyes kyi dus gang /
T09TD4153E:219b-36: kye lha mo gzhon nu ji lta ji ltar padma can de yang gang gis yang phrogs so //
T09TD4153E:220a-0: bdag gi bu gang gis phrogs @220a * //
T09TD4153E:220a-1: pas gang gis yang shin tu mi bzad pa 'dir gnas nas zhes bshums shing gnod pa shin tu mang ba dgon pa'i gnas 'dir bdag gis gzhan ci zhig sems par byed /
T09TD4153E:220a-2: bzhad gang pa du zhing kye ma yongs su tshim pa med pa'i gshin rjes de ring med par byas so zhes rnam par bsams te /
T09TD4153E:220a-3: kye lha mo ji ltar 'di bzhin du sdug bsngal spyod pa dang phrad /
T09TD4153E:220a-5: bdag me tog thu ba'i phyir gnas nas 'ongs pa dang phrad do //
T09TD4153E:220a-7: lha mo nam zhig drang srong chen pos khyod ma mthong ba dang khro bar 'gyur ro //
T09TD4153E:220a-8: de nas bzhengs la de bzhin du 'gro bar mdzod cig / bzhad gad pa nas /
T09TD4153E:220a-9: kye ji ltar s'a ri btson ra nas thar nas lag tu 'ongs pa la slar yang khyod kyi ji lta ba bzhin du der 'jug gam /
T09TD4153E:220a-11: na mnyam 'di ni chos kyi lugs ma yin no //
T09TD4153E:220a-12: padma can rgyal po la bltas nas ngu zhing 'phags pa'i bu khyod kyis bdag slar yang yongs su 'dor ram /
T09TD4153E:220a-14: ji ltar khyod kyis bdag g-yangs chen por skyur bar byed dam gzigs mdzod /
T09TD4153E:220a-15: don gang bdag gis yongs btang nas //
T09TD4153E:220a-16: slar yang len par 'dod pa ni //
T09TD4153E:220a-17: dper na khyi bzhin gsal por ni //
T09TD4153E:220a-18: slar yang skyugs pa za byed dam //
T09TD4153E:220a-19: shin tu yun ring gnas gyur kyang //
T09TD4153E:220a-20: bdag cag nam zhig 'bral bar nges //
T09TD4153E:220a-21: de bzhin du yang gsungs te /
T09TD4153E:220a-22: bsags pa thams cad mthar 'dzad cing //
T09TD4153E:220a-23: mthon po rnams ni dma' mor lhung //
T09TD4153E:220a-24: 'dus pa'i mtha' ni bral ba ste //
T09TD4153E:220a-25: gson pa'i mtha' yang 'chi ba yin //
T09TD4153E:220a-27: kun gyi rang bzhin yun ring gnas kyang rnam par 'bral //
T09TD4153E:220a-28: 'chi bdag zhags pas 'dzin cing rnam par kha gdangs rgyu //
T09TD4153E:220a-29: gal te chos phyir 'di ni da ltar rnam bral kyang //
T09TD4153E:220a-30: yang dag 'dus pa bas kyang shin tu dga' bar 'gyur //
T09TD4153E:220a-32: 'phags pa'i sras gang gsungs pa der bdag 'gro'o //
T09TD4153E:220a-33: gal te bdag 'gro yang rkang pa'i sna mi 'gro'o //
T09TD4153E:220a-35: lha mo ngang tshul 'dis bdag gi bka' ni sgrub par mdzod //
T09TD4153E:220a-36: na mnyam drang srong chen po'i gnas su lha mo skyel bar mdzod cig / bzhad gad pa nas /
T09TD4153E:220a-37: na mnyam ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du bya'o //
T09TD4153E:220a-38: padma can ni ngu zhing kye goo ta ma skad cig gzhes par mdzod cig / bdag ni re zhig 'phags pa'i bu lta'o //
T09TD4153E:220b-0: gdag [*bdag] ni skal ba dman te slar yang bdag @220b gis mthong bar bya ba ga la yin zhes chags shing nges par bltas nas 'phags pa'i bu bdag la'ang legs par gzigs mdzod /
T09TD4153E:220b-1: slar yang bdag gis khyod mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
T09TD4153E:220b-3: lha mo nyes par bltas pas ci zhig /'dus pa thams cad 'di bzhin 'gro bar 'gyur te gzigs mdzod //
T09TD4153E:220b-4: dper na lam pa lam zhugs rnams //
T09TD4153E:220b-6: tshogs kyang phyogs gzhan 'gro bar byed //
T09TD4153E:220b-7: de bzhin gnyen 'dun tshogs rnams so //
T09TD4153E:220b-9: kye na mnyam snying rje med par ma byed /
T09TD4153E:220b-10: kye lha mo'i dbugs 'byin par mdzod cig / rgyal po ni bshums shing ji ltar bdag gis dbugs dbyung bar bya ste /
T09TD4153E:220b-11: slar yang 'byung 'gyur yang dag 'dus pa thob ce'am ni slar yang khyod kyi sras po ni //
T09TD4153E:220b-12: padma skyes kyis 'dir ni blon po dang ni dpung tshogs thams cad bcas par 'gyur zhe'am //
T09TD4153E:220b-13: lha mo'i gyos sgyug bdag gi yab yum dag ni rab tu dang bas di ring thob ce'am //
T09TD4153E:220b-14: mnga' ris shin tu rgyas par smra'am ji ltar bdag gis dga' bas rab tu dbugs dbyung bya //
T09TD4153E:220b-15: yol ba'i nang nas 'di bzhin no zhes so //
T09TD4153E:220b-16: thams cad rtab rtab por gyur te /
T09TD4153E:220b-17: slar yang yol ba'i phag nas 'di bzhin no zhes ci zhig /'di bzhin gang la rig 'dzin rnams //
T09TD4153E:220b-18: dga' bas legs 'ongs nam mkha' las //
T09TD4153E:220b-19: me tog rnams kyi cha ra phab ste //
T09TD4153E:220b-21: rgyal po ni ngo tsha dang bcas te /
T09TD4153E:220b-22: lha mo 'dir yang 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas gal te bdag la 'dir lha mo dang bcas pa mthong na brdzun gyi dam bca' zhes 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T09TD4153E:220b-23: padma can du zhing phyag 'tshal te /
T09TD4153E:220b-24: khyod la lha rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur mod ces zer nas lta zhing yongs su song ngo //
T09TD4153E:220b-25: bzhad gad pa rjes su zhugs te song ngo //
T09TD4153E:220b-27: bud med rin chen sbyin par btang //
T09TD4153E:220b-28: yid ni 'gro zhing bya ba byas //
T09TD4153E:220b-29: bdag gi gtsug gi rin chen 'di //
T09TD4153E:220b-30: spun bzhin du ni don med gnas //
T09TD4153E:220b-31: da ni dam pa slong ba su zhig 'byung snyam pa na /
T09TD4153E:220b-32: de nas bram ze zhig zhugs nas kye bdag slong ba po zhes yongs su zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:220b-34: goo ta ma bram ze 'di ni ci zhig slong bar byed do snyam du bdag gi snying la sems so //
T09TD4153E:220b-36: kye lha mo 'di yang bram ze ste /
T09TD4153E:221a-0: thams cad du bdag cag bram zes gtong bar mi byed de 'di na yang @221a * //
T09TD4153E:221a-2: yang na nags tshang tshing gi phag tu lha mo lta zhing sdod cig bdag gis nye bar 'gro bar bya'o //
T09TD4153E:221a-3: bram zes nges par bltas te /
T09TD4153E:221a-4: 'di ni lha gtsug na nor bu gang yin pa 'di yin te /
T09TD4153E:221a-5: gcig pu nyid kyi phun tshogs kyis //
T09TD4153E:221a-6: sa gsum rnams ni khyab par mdzad //
T09TD4153E:221a-7: bskal pa chags dus gnas pa yi //
T09TD4153E:221a-8: legs ldan padmo'i skye gnas bzhin //
T09TD4153E:221a-10: kye rgyal po bde legs su gyur cig / rgyal po nas /
T09TD4153E:221a-11: bde bar 'ongs sam 'dir bzhugs shig gsung /
T09TD4153E:221a-12: mig g-yas pa 'phrig par gyur nas bsams pa /
T09TD4153E:221a-13: ji ltar mig ni g-yas 'gul zhing //
T09TD4153E:221a-14: gang zhig lhag par mngon gsal byed //
T09TD4153E:221a-15: gang ba rgya chen bsngags 'os pa'i //
T09TD4153E:221a-16: gsal bar slong ba por gyur nges //
T09TD4153E:221a-17: bram ze chen po ci slong bar byed gsungs shig ces so //
T09TD4153E:221a-18: bram ze ni ngo tsha bzhin du bdag ni nges par 'dod pa che'o //
T09TD4153E:221a-19: rgyal po dga' ba dang bcas te ngo tsha ba chog go //
T09TD4153E:221a-20: bdag nyid kyi bzhin du 'di thams cad kyang khyod kyi'o //
T09TD4153E:221a-22: gzhan don ro gcig shar ba yi //
T09TD4153E:221a-23: 'gro ba'i bshes gnyen zhi mdzad pa //
T09TD4153E:221a-24: bdag gi mngon 'dod khyod bzhin du //
T09TD4153E:221a-25: khyod kyi gtsug gi nor bu ste //
T09TD4153E:221a-26: bzhad gad pa rtab rtab por nye bar btud de /
T09TD4153E:221a-27: kye bram ze khyed la ngo tsha ba'ang med do //
T09TD4153E:221a-28: na mnyam dga' ba'i lus kyi gnas skabs kyang 'di bzhin du sdug bsngal bar byed dam /
T09TD4153E:221a-30: na mnyam de bzhin du ma byed /
T09TD4153E:221a-31: ji ltar bdag gi mchod pa'i gnas khyod kyis rgyang du 'phen nam /
T09TD4153E:221a-32: 'di ni sbyin bdag 'dir bdag slong mo pa //
T09TD4153E:221a-33: grogs po phyin ci log tu ci phyir byed //
T09TD4153E:221a-35: bdag gi kun mkhyen bzhon pa'i mchog yin no //
T09TD4153E:221a-37: yid bzhin nor dang slong ba'i skye bo dag / phun tshogs yon tan slong ba'i skya bo 'phags //
T09TD4153E:221a-38: yid bzhin nor ni nor tsam ster byed kyi //
T09TD4153E:221a-39: slong ba'i skye bo yon tan kun 'byung ngo //
T09TD4153E:221a-40: kye bram ze gtsug gi nor bu 'di ni ji ltar 'dod par bton nas khyer cig / bram ze nas /
T09TD4153E:221a-41: lha yi gtsug gi nor bu ri rab kyi //
T09TD4153E:221a-42: rtse mo lta bur su yis bskyod par nus //
T09TD4153E:221a-44: rdo ba yis bsnun cing thon cig / gzigs mdzod /
T09TD4153E:221a-45: chu shing snying po med pa ltar //
T09TD4153E:221a-46: rnam par nyams gyur bdag med pa'i //
T09TD4153E:221b-0: dga' 'gyur @221b gang gis skye ba med //
T09TD4153E:221b-2: yongs su skyobs shig yongs su skyobs shig / nags tshal gyi lha rnams gdug pa can gyi bram zes na mnyam dga' ba ni gsod par byed do //
T09TD4153E:221b-3: lha mo rtab rtab por gyur nas 'di las gzhan pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ram zhes nye bar 'ongs so //
T09TD4153E:221b-5: ci ste nags tshal gyi lha rnams 'ongs sam snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:221b-6: padma can nas 'phags ba'i sras bya ba 'dis ci zhig byed /
T09TD4153E:221b-8: yid kyi shing rta'i 'bras bu dang bcas so //
T09TD4153E:221b-9: padma can du zhing 'phags pa'i bu'i yid kyi shing rta'i 'bras bu dang bcas so //
T09TD4153E:221b-12: shin tu bdag tu rmongs pas chog go //
T09TD4153E:221b-14: 'khor ba'i chu gter sems can rnams //
T09TD4153E:221b-15: las kyi dba' rlabs shugs kyis bskyod //
T09TD4153E:221b-16: mthon po dag ni dma' mor 'phangs //
T09TD4153E:221b-17: de nas gang dang gang gis bsnyen //
T09TD4153E:221b-19: shin tu snying rje chen po la bltas nas bdag kyang yang dag par brtse ba skye na gtsug gi nor bu re zhig zhog cig / padma can nas /
T09TD4153E:221b-20: bram ze de bzhin du rjes su 'jug go //
T09TD4153E:221b-21: bzhad gad pa dga' nas legs par smras so //
T09TD4153E:221b-22: rgyal po shin tu mi mnyes nas /
T09TD4153E:221b-23: kye bram ze khyod kyis gzhan du smras nas 'di bzhin du rigs sam /
T09TD4153E:221b-25: rgyal po bdag cag gi yul du m'a ri'i nad zhugs te /
T09TD4153E:221b-26: de'i phyir blangs nas da ni 'dis spro bar byed do //
T09TD4153E:221b-27: rgyal po ni rtab rtab por ji lta ji ltar bram ze zhes gsungs /
T09TD4153E:221b-30: srong dang so so'i khyim rnams dur khrod mi bzad bzhin //
T09TD4153E:221b-31: yan lag brkyang zhing lus 'dzag shing gi phung po bzhin //
T09TD4153E:221b-32: ri rab kyang ni khyi dang mkha' 'gros rgyu ma rnams //
T09TD4153E:221b-33: rab gtugs 'di ni ku ru'i yul du byung bar gyur //
T09TD4153E:221b-36: kye bram ze m'a ri'i nad de rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i thabs gang yang med dam /
T09TD4153E:221b-38: 'chi nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i ched du 'di bzhin lha'i gtsug gi nor bu slong ba 'jig rten pa rnams kyis bdag btang ngo //
T09TD4153E:221b-39: rgyal po shin tu mnyes nas skye bo rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir bdag gi gtsug gi nor bu slong bar byed do zhes kun nas phyung nas /
T09TD4153E:221b-40: gtsug gi nor bu bkan nas rtsa ba rnam par bcings pa phyung nas ni //
T09TD4153E:221b-41: 'di ni tshad chen ri bong 'dzin pa'i 'od zer lta bur dkar //
T09TD4153E:222a-0: 'gro ba'i don rnams yang dag sgrub mdzad gnyis @222a * //
T09TD4153E:222a-2: mi drag 'gro ba kun gyi nad rnams 'di yis sel bar shog / ces byin te brgyal nas gar byed do //
T09TD4153E:222a-3: padma can du zhing ha 'phags pa'i sras ha mthu chen po mgon med pa rnams kyi gnyen khyod kyis bdag gcig pu 'dir yongs su 'dor bar byed dam zhes zer /
T09TD4153E:222a-5: ha na mnyam dga' ba 'gro ba kun gyi gnyen brtse ba chen po yongs su skyobs shig kye yongs su skyobs shig dpag bsam gyi shing yongs su 'dor zhing chu gter yongs su skam mo zhes zer /
T09TD4153E:222a-6: bram ze ni gzhan du 'dir bsdad nas ci byed /
T09TD4153E:222a-7: 'di ni sems dpa' chen po de'i mngon par 'dod pa bdag gis bsgrub par bya'o snyam nas yongs su zhugs nas bltas ba na der thub pa cig 'ongs so //
T09TD4153E:222a-8: bdag ni sdig pa ma bzad pa dang ldan pas ji srid 'dis mi mthong ba de srid bdag 'bros so snyam nas zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:222a-9: de nas drang srong 'od zer can rin chen phreng ba ma dang bcas te rab tu zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:222a-10: ci ste sgra chen gnas skabs ma yin 'di ltar lhung zhing ci ste sa chen g-yo bar byed //
T09TD4153E:222a-11: ci ste rlung rnams kyang ni rtsub cing ci ste phyogs rnams kyang ni skya bor 'gro bar byed //
T09TD4153E:222a-12: ci ste nyi ma yang ni mtshams min gza' yi bdag pos 'dzin cing bcom gnas gnas byed cing //
T09TD4153E:222a-13: ci ste nyi ma'i gung la di ring 'dir ni yul rnams mun pas yang dag sgrib par byed //
T09TD4153E:222a-14: 'di bzhin du mi'i bdag po la ji ltar sdug bsngal mi 'dod pa zhig go snyam nas bu mo rin chen phreng ba ma da ltar padma ba t'i gar song /
T09TD4153E:222a-15: rin chen phreng ba ma nas /
T09TD4153E:222a-16: chu klung dal gyis 'bab pa'i 'gram du me tog thur song ngo //
T09TD4153E:222a-17: drang srong nas 'di myur du bltar 'gro bar bya'o zhes yongs su zhugs phan rna bar cung zad thos nas aa ye ji ltar du ba'i sgra 'dra ba zhig go //
T09TD4153E:222a-18: der re zhig bdag 'gro bar bya'o zhes nas yongs su zhugs nas bltas pa na /
T09TD4153E:222a-19: rin chen phreng ba ma ngu zhing /
T09TD4153E:222a-20: legs ldan padma can ni ji ltar du zhing mchis so //
T09TD4153E:222a-22: drang srong nas 'di las gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang ngo //
T09TD4153E:222a-23: rin chen phreng ba mas nges par bltas nas /
T09TD4153E:222a-24: ha bdag gsod 'di ni lha gtsug na nor bu ste sa la 'gyel nas mchis so //
T09TD4153E:222a-26: ha bdag gsod bdag skal ba dman pa mi rtag pa ni stobs che'o //
T09TD4153E:222a-27: skye ba'i dpag bsam shing bzhin du //
T09TD4153E:222a-28: rtag tu 'tsho bar byed pa yi //
T09TD4153E:222b-0: @222b phun tshogs nges par skad cig tsam //
T09TD4153E:222b-2: ci zhig / ji lta bde bzhin du du bar byed do //
T09TD4153E:222b-4: legs ldan gzigs gzigs drang srong nas /
T09TD4153E:222b-7: legs ldan gtsug na nor bu'i sbyin pa'o //
T09TD4153E:222b-9: ha dpag bsam gyi shing 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig bu zhes zer /
T09TD4153E:222b-10: padma can la rin chen phreng ba ma 'khyud nas grogs mo dga' ma 'dir shog / gnas skabs kyi mtha' 'di la ltos shig / h'a bu padma skyes yab kyis kyang yongs su 'dor bar byed do //
T09TD4153E:222b-12: lag bzangs dag kyang rab tu zhugs te 'di ni nga'o //
T09TD4153E:222b-14: bzod par dka' las rgyal bar byas //
T09TD4153E:222b-15: rje bo lta zhing 'gro bar byed //
T09TD4153E:222b-16: de las yid kyi the tshom ci //
T09TD4153E:222b-18: aadzdza sna chen po yum dang bcas te yab dang 'jal bar byed do zhes zer /
T09TD4153E:222b-20: gzhon nu de ji lta ba de bzhin du bya'o zhes zer /
T09TD4153E:222b-21: yongs su zhugs pa na padma skyes rta ba bzhin du 'gyel par gyur to //
T09TD4153E:222b-22: aadzdza nga'i rkang pa la ci nam cig gis rmugs so zhes zer /
T09TD4153E:222b-23: lag bzangs 'jigs nas myur du bltas te rang nyid bsams pa dang /
T09TD4153E:222b-25: ji ltar 'di ni sbrul yin te /
T09TD4153E:222b-26: sa yi ser ga 'dir rjes su zhugs te song ngo //
T09TD4153E:222b-27: bdag gi mngon 'dod grub pa 'di nyams so snyam mo //
T09TD4153E:222b-28: yang na myur du lha'i drung du nye bar 'gro zhing sleb ma thag tu gtsug gi nor bu'i 'od zer gyis dug med par 'gyur ro //
T09TD4153E:222b-29: snyam nas gsal bar smras pa /
T09TD4153E:222b-30: gzhon nu myur du mdzod cig / yab yum dag dang mjal bar bya'o zhes smras pa na /
T09TD4153E:222b-31: nga'i rkang pa ni sbrid sil sil mchis so //
T09TD4153E:222b-33: lus po yang 'dir zhing mchis so zhes zer /
T09TD4153E:222b-34: lag bzangs kyi rna bar cung zad thos te /
T09TD4153E:222b-35: ji ltar 'dir yang du ba'i sgra zhig go snyam nas brtags pa na /
T09TD4153E:222b-36: de ci ste 'di ni lha mo bshums pa yin nam /
T09TD4153E:222b-37: 'di ni rin chen phreng ba ma'o //
T09TD4153E:222b-38: 'di ni legs ldan 'od zer can no snyam nas /
T09TD4153E:222b-39: shin tu sdangs nas 'di thams cad ci'i phyir ngu zhes yang bltas pa na /
T09TD4153E:222b-40: de rnams ni ngu zhing lha ni gzims nas bzhugs so //
T09TD4153E:222b-41: aa ye lha yi dbu ni ci'i phyir 'di bzhin du song //
T09TD4153E:222b-43: h'a rgyal po chen po ji ltar 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su gyur zhes lha mo la lta zhing /
T09TD4153E:222b-44: khyod kyi spyan ni btsums shing mchis //
T09TD4153E:222b-45: di ring 'jig rten snang ba med //
T09TD4153E:223a-1: byed dang bral nam mkha' bzhin //
T09TD4153E:223a-2: dbu yi gtsug kyang stong bar snang //
T09TD4153E:223a-3: zhes 'dren ba'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas /
T09TD4153E:223a-4: 'dir ni lha 'ba' zhig gshegs par ma zang de gtsug gi nor bu'i 'od zer dang bral bas da ni gzhon nu yang gshegs par 'gyur ro //
T09TD4153E:223a-5: rin chen phreng ba ma padma skyes la 'khyud de bu padma skyes yab la gzigs mdzod cig / phyi nas nam yang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
T09TD4153E:223a-9: bdag ni skal ba'i rang bzhin no //
T09TD4153E:223a-11: yab bzhengs mdzod bdag gi yum yang bshums shing mchis so zhes brgyal zhing gar byed do //
T09TD4153E:223a-13: rin chen phreng ba ma dag kyang h'a bu h'a gzhon nu /
T09TD4153E:223a-14: h'a bu chung khyod kyis kyang bdag cag yongs su 'dor ram /
T09TD4153E:223a-17: skal ba dman pa 'dir phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyal rigs stongs so //
T09TD4153E:223a-18: bzhad gad pa nas bu padma skyes dbugs phyung shig / drang srong gis nges par bltas pas ngo mtshar bar gyur nas //
T09TD4153E:223a-19: 'dir ni tsan dan chu yi theg le'i zer ma'i mkha' las yan lag mchog rnams char 'bebs shing //
T09TD4153E:223a-20: bung ba dang bcas me tog rnams ni ring nas lding zhing rig 'dzin rnams kyis 'thor bar byed //
T09TD4153E:223a-21: klung rnams kyang ni ngal gyis 'bab cing chu klung dal gyis 'bab pa gting zab rnams kyang ni //
T09TD4153E:223a-22: zil pa'i 'od zer 'gyed cing lha yi rnga rnams 'dir ni ri bo'i phug rnams rab myos byed //
T09TD4153E:223a-23: thams cad ya mtshan che nas bltas so //
T09TD4153E:223a-25: 'phags pa'i sras kyi sku ni lha rnams kyis mchod pa'i ched du lha'i 'jig rten du len par byed do zhes zer nas drang srong gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas /
T09TD4153E:223a-26: legs ldan bdag bkas rjes su gnang bar mdzod cig zer nas /
T09TD4153E:223a-28: bdag gi sreg shing sta gon gyis shig bdag gi gtam gyi phyi ma yin no zhes zer /
T09TD4153E:223a-30: kyee lha mo thang cig gzhes shig / bdag kyang na mnyam dga' ba'i rjes su lhan cig tu 'gro'o //
T09TD4153E:223a-31: drang srong nas da dung yang ngus nas ci zhig byed ma mthong ngam ci ste /
T09TD4153E:223a-32: 'di yi thugs ka rab tu 'gul zhing spyan yang 'phrig par byed //
T09TD4153E:223a-33: 'di yi zhal ni mtsho yi padma bzhin du rnam par 'dzum //
T09TD4153E:223a-34: 'di yi sku ni ba spu g-yo zhing phyag kyang skyob par rtsom //
T09TD4153E:223a-35: 'di yi spyan ni 'jig rten rnams dang lhan cig 'gyod pa rtsom //
T09TD4153E:223b-0: kye lha @223b mo kun nas 'khrug bar ma byed cig / na mnyam dga' bas kyang 'dzin par byed do //
T09TD4153E:223b-1: padma can nges par bltas nas /
T09TD4153E:223b-2: 'dir bdag gi skal pas dbugs 'byin par byed do zhes padma skyes kyis lag pa nas bzung nas bu dbugs phyung shig / bu dbugs phyung shig / khyod kyi yab ni 'tsho bar snang ngo zhes zer /
T09TD4153E:223b-3: rin chen phreng ba ma nas /
T09TD4153E:223b-4: kye rgyal po chen po'i 'khor rnams dbugs phyung shig zer //
T09TD4153E:223b-5: rgyal po ni bkan nas rtsa ba gces pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de nyid klog cing dal bus gsal bar byed do //
T09TD4153E:223b-7: 'phags pa'i sras 'di ni gzhon nu padma skyes te /
T09TD4153E:223b-9: rgyal po nas bu padma skyes 'dir shog gsungs /
T09TD4153E:223b-11: bdag gi skal bas 'dir ji ltar bya /
T09TD4153E:223b-12: lha 'di ni bdag gis ngal bso nas song ba na /
T09TD4153E:223b-13: sbrul gyi mche bas bzung ste brgyal nas mchis so //
T09TD4153E:223b-14: rgyal po ni rtab rtab por 'di ci zhig / padma can nas /
T09TD4153E:223b-15: h'a bu padma skyes kyis yab ma mthong ma zer /
T09TD4153E:223b-16: rin chen phreng ba ma nas /
T09TD4153E:223b-17: h'a grogs mo dga' ma khyod kyis yid kyi shing rta ma rdzogs so zhes zer /
T09TD4153E:223b-19: kye gshin rje tshim pa med pa zer /
T09TD4153E:223b-21: lha'i gtsug gi nor bu gang na /
T09TD4153E:223b-25: g-yo sgyus bcom ste bzod par rab tu dka' ba'i g-yo thabs nges par yin no //
T09TD4153E:223b-26: lha ji ltar dgra rnams 'tsho ba'i phyir gtsug gi nor bu ster bar byed /
T09TD4153E:223b-28: bdag la phyis kyang gdung ba med do //
T09TD4153E:223b-29: drang srong nas cis shes zer /
T09TD4153E:223b-31: gang zhig bden pa 'di dang snying rje'i bsam pa'i 'bras bu dang //
T09TD4153E:223b-32: de byin bdag la nam yang rjes su gdung ba med 'gyur na //
T09TD4153E:223b-33: de yis da ltar de bas nus mthu shin tu lhag gyur pa'i //
T09TD4153E:223b-34: 'gro la phan phyir bdag la gtsug gi nor bu 'byung bar shog / ces gsungs pa dang /
T09TD4153E:223b-35: glog 'khyug pa bzhin du mthong nas thams cad rtab rtab por gar byed do //
T09TD4153E:223b-36: padma skyes kyang nye bar langs so //
T09TD4153E:223b-38: aa ho sems dpa' chen po'i bsam pa rnam par dag gyur te //
T09TD4153E:223b-39: nyi ma 'od zer stong phrag rnams ni 'phro zhing gsal ba ltar //
T09TD4153E:223b-40: slar yang mi yi bdag la gtsug gi nor bur 'khrungs gyur nas //
T09TD4153E:223b-41: gang gi mthu ni rab brkyad [?] dug gi mun pa mngon par bcom //
T09TD4153E:224a-0: padma skyes kyang da ni padma bzhin du rab tu 'dzum zhes zer nas thams cad rtab rtab phor @224a * //
T09TD4153E:224a-2: padma can ni rgyal po la lta zhing padma skyes la 'khyud nas slar yang bdag gi mig phye bar gyur to zhes smra'o //
T09TD4153E:224a-4: na mnyam dga' ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon du mdzad do //
T09TD4153E:224a-5: rin chen phreng ba ma nas /
T09TD4153E:224a-6: 'di 'dra ba ltar yod pa bdag cag rnams dga' mo yin no zhes zer ro //
T09TD4153E:224a-8: gzhon nu yab yum dag la phyag 'tshol cig zer /
T09TD4153E:224a-9: padma skyes ni thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal bar byed /
T09TD4153E:224a-10: rgyal po nas chos dang ldan par gyur cig ces gsungs /
T09TD4153E:224a-11: padma skyes nas yab ji lta bar gyur cig zer /
T09TD4153E:224a-13: lha mo dang gzhon nu yang 'dir bdag gis 'bul bas rgyal po bzhes par mdzod cig zer /
T09TD4153E:224a-15: khyed ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du bya'o //
T09TD4153E:224a-16: thams cad shin tu dga' nas gar byed do //
T09TD4153E:224a-17: drang srong nas 'di bzhin du byas pa khyed kyis bzod par mdzod cig zer /
T09TD4153E:224a-18: 'dren pa nas rjes su bzung ba la bzod pa'i yul gang la yin gsungs /
T09TD4153E:224a-20: khyod kyi yon tan rnams kyis skye dgu'i yid kyi shing rta rdzogs par shog / mya ngam thang la chu gter dang ni ri bo 'dzeg pa'i skas su shog / chu gter sgrol ba'i gzings dang mi bzad mun pa rnams kyi snang bar shog /'jigs chen skyabs gnas dang ni dbul po rnams kyi dpag bsam shing du shog / ces zer ro //
T09TD4153E:224a-21: rgyal po nas 'di gang zhig / drang srong nas /
T09TD4153E:224a-22: 'di ni lha yi tshogs rnams mnyam du khyab 'jug dbang phyug tshangs pa dbang po zla ba sogs //
T09TD4153E:224a-23: lha rnams kun gyis mkha' yi khang bzangs gnas shing thams cad 'di bzhin nam mkha' khyab par gyur //
T09TD4153E:224a-24: chen po de rnams gang rnams kyi ni rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phel zhing ser po dkar po yis //
T09TD4153E:224a-25: phyogs rnams rab tu mdzes shing khyab pa rtsig logs ri mor bris pa bzhin du mdzad gyur to //
T09TD4153E:224a-26: khyed kyi yab yum dag kyang nam mkha'i bzhon pa la gnas nas bu dang bcas shing chung mar bcas pa shis pa shis pa brjod par bya'o //
T09TD4153E:224a-27: rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas phyag byas so //
T09TD4153E:224a-28: legs ldan ci zhig bsgrub par bya ba gsungs shig / drang srong nas /
T09TD4153E:224a-29: khyod ni med gyur mnga' ris sdug bsngal gnas //
T09TD4153E:224a-30: slar yang gshegs shing slar yang skyong bar mdzod //
T09TD4153E:224a-31: di rings ke'i grong khyer gshegs pa'i phyir //
T09TD4153E:224a-32: mkha' bzhon 'di yang dbang pos khyod la bsrings //
T09TD4153E:224b-1: gong ma rnams ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du bya'o //
T09TD4153E:224b-2: thams cad shin tu dga' zhing zhon nas gar byed do //
T09TD4153E:224b-3: yongs su zhugs pa na rgyal po nas /
T09TD4153E:224b-4: aa ho mkha'i bzhon pa ni shin tu mgyogs te /
T09TD4153E:224b-6: ngang ba'i gshog pa rnam par bskyod pas rgyu ba'i tshogs ltar chu 'dzin rnams ni ring por gyur//
T09TD4153E:224b-7: ri bo'i dbang po rnams ni glang chen dbang po myos bzhin mngon du phyogs nas rgyug cing 'ong //
T09TD4153E:224b-8: 'di ni dbang pos dkrigs shing 'khor lo bzhin du nam mkha'i mthil ni rnam par gcod par byed //
T09TD4153E:224b-9: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nye ba'i 'od zer tshogs pas bskor zhing byang gi phyogs su 'gro bar byed //
T09TD4153E:224b-11: 'di ni bzod dka' grong khyer skye bo gnas bcas khyod las ni //
T09TD4153E:224b-12: bdud ris dkrugs shing 'jig rten kun 'tsho blta zhing phyag byed do //
T09TD4153E:224b-13: 'di rnams kyang ni skye bo'i gnas bcas shin tu 'das byas nas //
T09TD4153E:224b-14: bdag nyid ji lta bzhin du grong khyer s'a ke ta nas so //
T09TD4153E:224b-15: slar yang khyod kyi dga' ba'i bya ba ci zhig yod pa smra bar gyis shig / rgyal po nas /
T09TD4153E:224b-16: 'di las kyang dga' bar bya ba ci zhig yod //
T09TD4153E:224b-17: lha mo padma ba t'i bu yi zhal dang dga' ba'i goo tam /
T09TD4153E:224b-18: bzhon zhing mkha' yi bzhon pa la gnas yab yum lha tshogs 'khor bcas mthong //
T09TD4153E:224b-19: dga' ba'i blon po sna chen dang ni skye bo'i sdug bsngal ma lus pa //
T09TD4153E:224b-20: rab tu zhi gyur gzhan ni ci zhig bsgrub par bya zhing bya ba ci //
T09TD4153E:224b-21: 'on kyang dga' bar bya ba yod de //
T09TD4153E:224b-22: 'gro rnams dam chos 'byung zhing rab tu sbyor ba'i ltad mo chen por shog / legs spyod yon tan rnams kyis 'chi bdag yid kyi shing rta 'bras med shog / thub pa'i skye bo'i gtam gyi 'brel tshogs zhi zhing bdud rtsi'i char rnams kyis //
T09TD4153E:224b-23: bsil zhing dge bas zla ba'i snang bas rab tu 'gro zhing don byed shog / gang zhig snyan ngag bden pa rnams kyis dus ring dga' byas shi l'u sha yi sred rnams kyis //
T09TD4153E:224b-24: dus ring nas ni nor gyi khur thob ring nas skye bo'i sems ni rab tu dga' bar mdzad //
T09TD4153E:224b-25: slar yang bkur gnas mthong bar gyur nas dpal ldan chags pa dang bral zhes pas mdzad gyur pa //
T09TD4153E:224b-26: 'jig rten kun du dga' ba sna tshogs zlos gar 'di ni gar gyis gzhir thob par shog / ces smras nas thams cad nges par zhugs so //
T09TD4153E:224b-27: yan lag lnga pa rdzogs so /
T09TD4153E:225a-0: // / gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu'i skyes pa'i rabs zlos gar gyi bstan bcos 'jig rten @225a * //
T09TD4153E:225a-1: kun du dga' ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po tsandra go mis rab tu sbyar ba'o /
T09TD4153E:225a-3: // / dam pa rnams kyi tshul la brten nas pandi ta chen po k'i rti tsandra dang /
T09TD4153E:225a-4: yar lungs pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis bal yul yam bu'i grong khyer du legs par bsgyur ro /
